product.titre: Pure Acetyl L-Carnitine (ALCAR) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Acetyl-L-Carnitine Powder (sometimes shortened to ALCAR) is a type of L-Carnitine that has been acetylized. It is naturally produced in the body and is derived from the two essential amino acids, Methionine and Lysine.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: Acetyl L-Carnitine (ALCAR) | Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Acetyl-L-Carnitine Powder (sometimes shortened to ALCAR) is a type of L-Carnitine that has been acetylized. It is naturally produced by the human body in the kidneys and liver and is derived from the two essential amino acids, Methionine and Lysine. The body uses Acetyl-L-Carnitine to assist in oxidizing fatty acids. In simpler terms, this means that this ALCAR is used to help convert the fatty acids found in food into an exhaustible energy source, that in turn fuels the body. This works because ALCAR is the main vehicle that assists in the transference of these fatty acids to the mitochondrial membrane of each local cell where this oxidization routinely happens. ALCAR can be found in larger deposits near the areas of the body that most actively break down fatty acids on a regular basis, including those muscles that control the skeleton and the heart.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: Acetyl L-Carnitine (ALCAR) | Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Acetyl-L-Carnitine Powder (sometimes shortened to ALCAR) is a type of L-Carnitine that has been acetylized. It is naturally produced by the human body in the kidneys and liver and is derived from the two essential amino acids, Methionine and Lysine. The body uses Acetyl-L-Carnitine to assist in oxidizing fatty acids. In simpler terms, this means that this ALCAR is used to help convert the fatty acids found in food into an exhaustible energy source, that in turn fuels the body. This works because ALCAR is the main vehicle that assists in the transference of these fatty acids to the mitochondrial membrane of each local cell where this oxidization routinely happens. ALCAR can be found in larger deposits near the areas of the body that most actively break down fatty acids on a regular basis, including those muscles that control the skeleton and the heart.

product.titre: Pure Green Tea 50% Polyphenols Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Green Tea P.E. 50% Polyphenols is a green tea derivative that has been evaluated to contain at least 50% Polyphenols.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Mental Wellness, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Skin Care & Beauty
product.titre: Pure Inositol Hexaphosphate Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Inositol Hexaphosphate is the main vehicle through which phosphorus is stored in plant tissues. It is sometimes called IP6, Phytate or Phytic acid when it is in the form of a salt.

product.titre: Pure Lutein Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Lutein is an antioxidant that is found in the carotenoid family and is often found in large concentrations in vegetables. Because Lutein is not made naturally by the body, it must be supplemented or found through dietary means.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Sports Supplements
product.titre: Pure AN,N-Dimethyl Glycine HCL (DMG) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: N,N-Dimethyl Glycine HCL is derived from the original amino acid glycine through a process known as demethylization. Dimethyl Glycine is part of the B-chain of vitamins and may assist in recovery after strenuous physical activity.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Skin Care & Beauty
product.titre: Pure Para-AminoBenzoic Acid (PABA) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Para-Aminobenzoic Acid is a type of amino acid that is not related to proteins and can be found naturally in a number of different places. It can be found in large stores from such sources as eggs, rice, spinach, molasses and wheat germ.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Skin Care & Beauty, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Pure Pine Bark Extract Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description:
Pine Bark Extract contains Proanthocyanidin, which is a bioflavonoid and another type of antioxidant. This particular extract is derived from the Pinis Massoniana tree.

There are many antioxidants out there that perform the same actions as Pine Bark Extract with varying degrees of success. Some of this extract’s peers include Vitamins A, C, and E as well as Selenium. However, the Oligomeric Proanthocyanodins (OPCs) present in Pine Bark Extract are some of the most potent forms of antioxidants that can be found in nature.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Digestive Support, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Pure Pomegranate Extract Ellagic Acid Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Classified as an antioxidant, Ellagic Acid is naturally occurring and protects healthy cells from damage by free radical molecules. It is mostly found in concentrated amounts in such foods as grapes, nuts, pomegranates, cranberries and strawberries.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Pure Portulaca Oleracea (Purslane) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Purslane (Portulaca oleracea) is a green and leafy wild vegetable. It is found mainly throughout Asia and has been used for centuries for its properties. As it is used today, Purslane is meant mainly to promote general good health and well-being.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Mental Wellness, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Sports Supplements
product.titre: Pure Alpha Lipoic Acid (R-ALA) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: R-Alpha-Lipoic Acid, sometimes referred to as R-ALA, is an antioxidant that is naturally produced by the human body. R-ALA is believed to be a more potent and effective form of its parent, ALA.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Men's Health, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Muscle Growth, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Women's Health, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Pure Resveratrol Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Resveratrol is a compound found in red grapes, berries and plants. It use is mainly to protect plants from rapidly developing mold. It also shields plants against UV radiation and the drying effect of drought, to some degree. In addition, Resveratrol also functions as an antioxidant.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Pure Rutin Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Rutin powder is a type of flavonoid that gives certain plants their color. It also possesses the abilities of an antioxidant.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins
product.titre: Pure Vitamin E Oil 1300 IU Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description:
Vitamin E is an antioxidant known for being extremely effective at what it does and at being very fat soluble. It is able to protect healthy cells from sustaining damage from free radicals which may seek to harm them.

One little known fact is that Vitamin E is not a single agent, but it is actually a name given to a variety of different compounds which are individually part of a family of Tocopherols and Tocotrienols. Each of these compounds has its own job and its own level of importance in the body.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Skin Care & Beauty
product.titre: Pure Vitamin E Powder 700IU in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Vitamin E is a fat-soluble antioxidant known for being extremely effective at protecting healthy cells from sustaining damage from free radicals. Contrary to popular belief, Vitamin E is not a single agent, but a name given to a variety of different compounds belonging to the family of Tocopherols and Tocotrienols. Each of these compounds has its own job and its own level of importance in the body. In fact, the Vitamin E comes in eight different forms that have their own importance in the body's biological processes.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Mental Wellness
product.titre: Pure Zinc Gluconate Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Zinc Gluconate is one of the more highly preferred supplements for zinc due to its relatively high bioavailability and its ease on the stomach. This compound is made up of one atom of zinc and two atoms of Gluconate for every molecule.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Men's Health, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Mental Wellness, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Pure Zinc Oxide Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Zinc Oxide is a compound made up of a single atom of zinc bound to a single atom of oxygen and is primarily used to supplement for Zinc deficiency. Zinc itself can help maintain skin health; for this reason, this particular combination is often found in sunscreens.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Digestive Support, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Pure Betaine HCL Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Like Betaine Anhydrous, Betaine Hydrochloride has a chemical structure which can be likened to that of Choline, and it is a form of Glycine which has gone through the process of trimethylization. This type of chemical must be industrially manufactured and synthesized, meaning it is not a substance that can be found naturally as with many other supplements. It is a combination of the more commonly found Betaine as well as Hydrocholoric acid.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Women's Health, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Pure Chlorella Blue-Green Algae Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Chlorella Algae (or as it is known scientifically, Chlorella Pyrenoidosa) is a unicellular plant found in fresh water and is the size of a single human blood cell. It possesses a blue-green color because of the excessive amounts of Chlorophyll present in its molecular structure.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Skin Care & Beauty
product.titre: Pure Vitamin A Palmitate Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Vitamin A Palmitate is one of the main components that make up palm oil. It is sometimes called Retinyl Palmitate, as it is a synthetic alternative to the Retinyl Acetate normally found in Vitamin A supplements.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Heart Health, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Phytosterol (Beta Sitosterol) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Phytosterol is a plant sterol, an organic compound that is similar to animal-based cholesterol. Sterols are precursors to important fat-soluble vitamins and help maintain overall good health.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Sports Supplements
product.titre: Pure Betaine Anhydrous Trimethylglycine (TMG) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Betaine Anhydrous is a derivative of Choline and is an important nutrient. It is also known as Trimethylglycine (TMG).

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Heart Health, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Pure Nattokinase Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Nattokinase is derived from the popular Japanese culinary sensation known as Natto. The texture of Natto is much like cheese, but it is actually derived from soybeans that have undergone intense fermentation. Nattokinase is created as a byproduct of this interaction between bacteria and the soybeans. It helps maintain overall good health.*

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Heart Health, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Mental Wellness, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Skin Care & Beauty
product.titre: Pure Niacin (Vitamin B3) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Niacin is an organic compound commonly referred to as Vitamin B3. Because it is an essential nutrient, deficiency may require supplementation.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Heart Health, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Men's Health, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Pure Red Yeast Rice Extract (RYR) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description:
Red Yeast Rice Extract is a derivative of red yeast that grows on rice. It has found widespread use by being served along with food in Asian countries, with people consuming between 15 and 55 grams a day, depending on the country.

This product is Kosher certified.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Pure Bearberry Leaf Extract 4:1 (Uva Ursi) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Bearberry Leaf is a type of shrub that grows perennially and can be found in Europe, Asia and parts of North America. It is a plant that helps in erosion control of soil and therefore can be found growing in many different types of gardens all around the world. Bearberry Leaf naturally contains glycosides, such as arbutin, ericolin and methylarbutin. It also contains many flavonoids such as ellagic acid, malic acid, tannins and ursolic acid.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Mental Wellness, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Pure Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Ginkgo Biloba powder is extracted from the maidenhair tree, which is primarily located in the eastern hemisphere. Ginkgo trees are renowned for their beauty, resilience and culinary and clinical use.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Weight Loss, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Pure Hoodia Gordonii Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Hoodia Gordonii is a type of flowering cactus that is found mainly in the South African Kalahari Desert. Because of its rarity, the plant has come under control by conservation services. However, this product is exported legally out of South Africa.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Joint & Bone Support
product.titre: Pure Horsetail Extract Powder Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Horsetail is a fern-like plant that can be found throughout Asia, Europe, North America and the Middle East.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Men's Health, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Muscle Growth, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Pure LongJack Extract 100:1 Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Longjack is a plant extract that has been used for hundreds of years throughout Asia as a way of boosting overall physical performance by helping increase energy and stamina.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Digestive Support, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Pure Dandelion Root Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: This supplement is taken from the root of the taraxacum plant, more commonly known as the dandelion. While the entire plant is edible, the root is frequently used in dietary supplements for its various benefits.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Digestive Support, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Pure Milk Thistle Extract Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Milk Thistle, or as it is sometimes referred to, Holy Thistle, belongs to the daisy family and has been used for thousands of years. It should be noted that Milk Thistle is not the same thing as milkweed.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal, BulkSupplements > Products by Category, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Heart Health, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Women's Health, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Pure Red Clover Extract Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Red Clover is a perennial plant which is seen throughout Asia and Europe and it has recently been brought to North America. Red Clover is known for providing support for both the respiratory and circulatory systems. The skin may also make use of Red Clover for cleansing and strengthening purposes.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Mental Wellness, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Pure Rhodiola Rosea 3% Rosavin Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Rhodiola Rosea is a plant distinguished by its tendency to grow in colder climates, such as the Rocky Mountains and certain arctic regions. It contains 17 different amino acids that are all necessary in promoting vital bodily functions.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Pure Senna Leaf Extract Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Senna grows in Arabic nations predominately, but can also be found in Africa and India.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Men's Health, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Mental Wellness, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Pure St John's Wort Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description:
St. John's Wort is a popular kind of plant used for its properties since the Middle Ages. It contains Hyperforin, Hypericin and flavonoids.

This product is Kosher certified.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Arginine HCL | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: L-Arginine is a substance produced by the body in limited quantities which is important in maintaining good oxygen flow throughout the body, in manufacturing Creatine (an exercise stimulant and energy creator), and in maintaining good functioning of the liver and kidneys. The HCL is added to maintain a neutral pH so that the resulting concoction creates less stomach issues than standard Arginine base, which has been linked to a few cases of stomach upset.

product.titre: L-Arginine HCL | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Pure White Willow Bark Extract 15% Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: White Willow (sometimes called Salicin Willow) possesses many health benefits that have kept it prized for thousands of years. White Willow actually contains salacin, a natural chemical believed to act similarly to aspirin.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Joint & Bone Support, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Pure Calcium Carbonate Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Calcium Carbonate is a chemical compound comprised of calcium, oxygen and carbon.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Joint & Bone Support, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Pure Calcium Citrate Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Calcium Citrate, containing about 21% Calcium, is higher up on the list than most supplements in terms of overall Calcium content and has the most efficient absorption capabilities. It comes in the form of a vaguely tart, salt-like compound made up of Citric Acid and Calcium.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Joint & Bone Support, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Pure Calcium Gluconate Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Calcium Gluconate is a synthesis of Calcium and Gluconic Acid. It is classified as a Calcium Salt, meaning that it is soluble in water.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Weight Loss, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Mental Wellness, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Sports Supplements
product.titre: Pure Caffeine Powder (Synthetic) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description:
BulkSupplements.com no longer offers pure caffeine powder to consumers. If you are a manufacturer, you may purchase caffeine powder with a valid FDA Registration Number. Contact customer support for more info.

WARNING! Caffeine is HIGHLY TOXIC in higher quantities. Excess use with as little as a few grams may result in death. DO NOT use more than 200 milligrams (mg) of Caffeine in a single serving, or more than 600 milligrams (mg) in a day. Accurate measurement requires a milligram weight scale. Do not take if you have a history of heart disease, or if you are pregnant or nursing. Consult your physician before taking this product.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Mental Wellness
product.titre: Pure DMAE-Bitartrate Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: DMAE Bitartrate, which is sometimes referred to as Deanol, is an antioxidant. It occurs naturally, is similar to Choline on a purely chemical basis and has two methyl groups. It is a popular supplement among bodybuilders and other athletes.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: Pure Gamma Aminobutyric Acid (GABA) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Gamma Aminobutyric Acid (GABA) is classified as an inhibitory neurotransmitter and a nonessential nutrient that is important in promoting overall mental wellness.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Featured, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Skin Care & Beauty, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Joint & Bone Support
product.titre: Pure Hyaluronic Acid (Na Hyaluronate) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Hyaluronic Acid is a necessary component of connective tissue and belongs to a protein family called glycosaminoglycans. Hyaluronic Acid possesses antioxidant properties as well.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Mental Wellness, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Skin Care & Beauty
product.titre: Pure Inositol (Vitamin B8) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Inositol (Vitamin B8) is a nonessential vitamin that promotes cellular health throughout the body. It is classified as a lipid.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Skin Care & Beauty, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Joint & Bone Support, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Pure Methylsulfonylmethane (MSM) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Methylsulfonylmethane (MSM) is a sulfur compound that has been found to occur naturally in the human body and in milk, fish, green vegetables and various grains. It is usually sold as a dietary supplement. The extract generally comes in the form of a white crystalline powder that can be dissolved in water.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Mental Wellness, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Pure Phenylethylamine HCL (PEA) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description:
Phenylethylamine (PEA) HCL is what is known as a neuromodulator. It is derived from L-Phenylalanine through the process of decarboxylation.

Phenylethylamine Hydrochloride can be found in such food sources as chocolate, but unfortunately the body’s natural metabolic process is too rapid for PEA HCL to actually be absorbed into the system correctly. Therefore, food sources are not ideal for the purposes of supplementing PEA HCL.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Women's Health, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Pure Spirulina Powder (Organic) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description:
Spirulina Plantensis is an edible food supplement version of a microscopic algae organism with a blue-green hue. Each organism is made up of a single cell, and can be found in a variety of different watery environments including marine, tropical and saltpan regions.

This product is Kosher certified.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Skin Care & Beauty
product.titre: Pure Vitamin B5 Calcium Pantothenate / Pantothenic Acid Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Pantothenic Acid (Vitamin B5) comes in several different forms. As far as supplemental sources are concerned, D-Calcium Pantothenate is the most popular due to its higher stability and quick rate of absorption into the digestive tract. While it can be naturally found in most unprocessed foods, it is especially prevalent in chicken, milk, beef and mushrooms.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Arginine Base | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
L-Arginine is a type of amino acid that does work to maintain the integrity of the skin, joints, liver, and muscles. It also helps in maintaining good levels of blood sugar, hormones, and keeps the immune system functioning well.

Arginine is one of the rare amino acids that is considered semi-essential, because although the body can manufacture perfectly appropriate amounts of the acid to keep up to normal amounts, every once in a while it may be necessary to supplement it. Arginine is able to support the immune system through its ability to produce T-cells and it is also supportive of the liver in that it is able to rid the body of toxins. Urea is needed in order for the body to expel Ammonia through the urine, however urea would not be manufactured without Arginine.

product.titre: Pure Biotin Pure (Vitamin B7) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Biotin functions as a form of Vitamin B, sometimes referred to as Vitamin B7 or Vitamin H. It is an essential nutrient prevalent in algae, mold, yeast and bacteria.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Mental Wellness
product.titre: Pure Riboflavin (Vitamin B2) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Riboflavin is another name for Vitamin B2. It is a necessary ingredient in many different metabolic processes that help sustain healthy cells with energy.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins
product.titre: Pure Vitamin B1 (Thiamine HCL) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Vitamin B1 provides the body with a source of Thiamine to use in the process of breaking down carbohydrates to be used as energy. Thiamine is also necessary for amino acids to be properly metabolized.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Mental Wellness
product.titre: Pure Vitamin B1 (Thiamine Mononitrate) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Vitamin B1 provides the body with a source of Thiamine to use in the process of breaking down carbohydrates to be used as energy. Thiamine is also necessary for amino acids to be properly metabolized.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins
product.titre: Pure Vitamin B12 (Pure Cyanocobalamin) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Cyanocobalamin is another name for Vitamin B12. Most water-soluble nutrients and vitamins are usually quickly expelled through the urinary tract, making Vitamin B12 fairly unique. This product is completely pure and should be used with caution. It is not intended for individual use.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Mental Wellness
product.titre: Pure Vitamin B12 1% (Cyanocobalamin) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Cyanocobalamin is another name for Vitamin B12. Most water-soluble nutrients and vitamins are usually quickly expelled through the urinary tract, making Vitamin B12 fairly unique.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Mental Wellness, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Skin Care & Beauty
product.titre: Pure Vitamin B3 (Niacinamide) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Niacinamide (Vitamin B3), though closely related to Niacin, does have differing effects. Each of them plays an important role in the metabolism of energy in that they may be converted into coenzymes.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Mental Wellness
product.titre: Pure Vitamin B6 (Pyridoxine HCL) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Pyridoxine (Vitamin B6) is an essential vitamin and is a combination of three different compounds: Pyridoxine, Pyridoxamine and Pyroxidal.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Heart Health, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins
product.titre: Pure Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description:
Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol) is an important nutrient responsible for regulating calcium levels, which contributes to the health of teeth, bones and cartilage. It is often preferred over Vitamin D2 because of its easy absorption and stronger effects.

Vitamin D levels are moderated by the sunlight, as there is a chemical contained in the skin that absorbs the Vitamin D. As a fat-soluble vitamin, it can also be found in food with high fat content, particularly oily fish and other animal products. Its solubility in oil allows it to be stored in the body to some extent as well.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins
product.titre: Pure Vitamin E (DL) Oil in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Vitamin E Oil itself, is not marketed nearly as often as a supplement. It is mainly targeted at being consumed for use as a food preservative. It is found listed as an additive in many types of food, especially those that have a high fat content such as butter; however it may also be found in baby food and nutrition products. This form of Vitamin E is man-made (in other words it is not found naturally), and it is not nearly as active as the natural form. It takes much more of the synthetic form to be equivalent to one small serving of the natural form.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Men's Health, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Women's Health
product.titre: Pure Diindolylmethane (DIM) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Diindolylmethane (DIM) is a byproduct of the naturally occurring breakdown of glucobrassicin, which can be found in sources like cauliflower, broccoli and similar vegetables.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Skin Care & Beauty, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Pure Grapefruit Seed Extract Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Grapefruit Seed Extract is a supplement known for its ability to act as an antioxidant. The seed of a grapefruit has components that make it up at a molecular level, including flavonoids (the chief source of the antioxidant properties), sources of Vitamin C and E, limonoids, sterols, citric acid and various minerals.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Women's Health, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Mental Wellness
product.titre: Pure Melatonin Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Melatonin is created within the pineal gland that controls the way the brain keeps track of time during sleep. Exposure to darkness triggers Melatonin, informing the body that sleep is needed. It is actually produced directly from tryptophan, a chemical found in turkey that is usually associated with sleep. Though it was discovered in the 1950s, commercial use became available in 1994.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Men's Health
product.titre: Pure Quercetin Dihydrate Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Quercetin is a flavonoid that has antioxidant properties.Though Quercetin provides coloring for many different plants, it can be found in the highest concentrations in citrus fruits, onions, apples, parsley, red wine and certain kinds of tea. The darker the fruit, the more flavonoids present.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Women's Health, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Mental Wellness, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: Pure 5-HTP (Griffonia Seed Extract) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: 5-HTP is a naturally occurring amino acid that also acts as an intermediate between serotonin and melatonin, two neurotransmitters.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Sports Supplements
product.titre: Pure L-Citrulline DL-Malate 2:1 Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: L-Citrulline DL-Malate is a combination of Citrulline, an amino acid, and Malate, the salt of malic acid. It is popularly used as a dietary supplement to boost athletic performance.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Digestive Support, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Pure Guar Gum Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Guar Gum is a derivative of the guar plant, which can be found in areas such as Pakistan or India. It is routinely cultivated in the United States and is used as a thickener and stabilizer in many products and other supplements.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Pure Rhodiola Rosea 3% Salidroside Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Rhodiola Rosea is a plant distinguished by its tendency to grow in colder climates, such as the Rocky Mountains and certain arctic regions. It contains 17 different amino acids that are all necessary in promoting vital bodily functions.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Men's Health, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Muscle Growth, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Pure Tribulus Terrestris Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Tribulus Terrestris can be found in many different countries in more tropical regions. Some of these areas include China, Europe and Mexico.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Pure Calcium Lactate Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Calcium Lactate is a chemical compound produced when Calcium Carbonate combines with Lactic acid. It is frequently used as a food additive as well.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Pure Calcium Pyruvate Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Calcium Pyruvate is a combination of the mineral calcium and pyruvic acid. Pyruvate is made naturally in the body.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Mental Wellness, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Pure Dicalcium Phosphate (DCP) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Dicalcium Phosphate, or as it is sometimes called, Calcium Monohydrogen Phosphate, is a type of Dibasic Calcium Phosphate that is normally found in sources such as cereals, noodles, enriched flour, chicken feed and some types of dog snacks.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Pure Magnesium Carbonate Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description:
Magnesium Carbonate is an easily absorbed type of Magnesium salt which happens to be one of the most important minerals in the body, thus making Magnesium Carbonate a great way for the body to replenish low levels of Magnesium.

The Carbonate content in Magnesium makes this particular supplement alkaline. It is often found in antacid brands and is used to help with excess stomach acid that causes abdominal pain.*

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Men's Health, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Mental Wellness, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Pure Magnesium Citrate Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Magnesium Citrate is a chemical cross between Citric Acid and Magnesium Carbonate.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Sports Supplements, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Pure Magnesium Gluconate Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Magnesium Gluconate is the resulting combination of Magnesium and Gluconic Acid salt.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Pure Magnesium Glycinate Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Magnesium Glycinate is one of the most easily absorbed types of Magnesium supplement available. It is one of the more easily digested as well, making it popular among those with stomach troubles.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Pure Magnesium Hydroxide Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Magnesium Hydroxide, or as it is sometimes referred to, Milk of Magnesia, is a compound whose main purpose is to keep up bowel regularity. Because Magnesium is known to work so well with Calcium, it is recommended that it be taken along with a Calcium supplement at a 1:2 ratio.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Pure Manganese Gluconate Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Manganese Gluconate is a salt combining Gluconic Acid and Manganese. It is meant primarily to function as a coenzyme to several different metabolic processes.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Pure Potassium Chloride Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Potassium Chloride is a kind of salt derived from Potassium and Chlorine. It is used in the food processing industry, in medicine and various scientific processes.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Pure Potassium Citrate Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Potassium Citrate is the resulting combination of Citric Acid and Potassium. It has a higher rate of absorption than most Potassium supplements and is often the favored source of Potassium for those who require supplementation.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Pure Potassium Gluconate Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Potassium Gluconate is an organic compound made up of Gluconic Acid combined with a salt of Potassium. It is found in various strengths and can be bought either over the counter or prescribed in higher strengths by a doctor.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Pure Potassium Iodate Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description:
Potassium Iodate is a compound that is a mixture between Potassium base and Iodic acid. The supplement is meant to be taken to replenish deficient individuals with their necessary daily allowance of Iodine.

You may be familiar with Potassium Iodate as it is used all the time in the manufacture of iodized salt. About 60mg of the chemical are sprayed on every ton of salt. This can also be found as an ingredient in disinfectants and deodorant as well as some types of medication.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Pure Potassium L-Aspartate Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Potassium L-Aspartate is a combination of the chemical elements Potassium and Aspartic Acid intended to provide optimum health benefits. Potassium is highly abundant in nature and accounts for 2 percent of a person's body weight.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Arginine a-Ketoglutarate (AAKG) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: L-Arginine Alpha-Ketoglutarate is a 2:1 salt formed from the combination of two parts Arginine and one part Alpha-Ketoglutarate. This supplement is popular among athletes because it helps with the synthesis of amino acids, and the creation of nitric oxide, making more proteins available to the body during exercise cycles.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Alanine | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Glucose is often thought of as one of the most important elements to constantly supplement because it is connected to supplying your body with energy. However, without the nonessential (meaning it is produced naturally in the body, usually insufficient enough quantities that supplementation is not needed) amino acid, L-Alanine; it would be impossible for the body to actually convert the Glucose into energy. Therefore L-Alanine is very important, not only for this, but for being able to help the liver expel harmful toxic substances from the body, and for helping to maintain good blood sugar levels.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: Glycine | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Glycine is an amino acid considered nonessential (meaning that it can be produced by the body), however it is very important in the formation of muscle tissue and in the conversion of glucose into energy. Both the central nervous system and the digestive system owe a debt to Glycine for its ability to protect them. On top of that, Glycine also provides general antioxidant protection to the body by stopping harmful free radicals from doing damage to healthy cells. In its ability to make energy out of glucose, Glycine is able to keep blood sugar at normal levels. One of the other ways in which Glycine helps the body, is by assisting in the synthesis of stomach bile. This process allows the digestive system to function correctly, dissolve foods into usable nutrients, and break down fats. For this reason, Glycine can be found in many antacids. Glycine is an amino acid that can be found in all living organisms and is the most simple of all the 20 amino acid types that can be found naturally.

product.description: Glutathione is a tripeptide made up of Glutamate, Cysteine, and Glycine, all very important amino acids. It is soluble in water and can be found in both oxidized and reduced forms. The reduced form has antioxidant properties which keep cells safe from being harmed by free radical molecules.

product.titre: EDTA Disodium | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
EDTA Disodium | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
EDTA Disodium | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
EDTA Disodium | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
EDTA Disodium | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
EDTA Calcium Disodium | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
EDTA is short for Ethylenediaminetetraacetic Acid. It is the chemical used to remove the presence of metals in the body, such as Mercury and Lead in a process called Chelation Therapy. It has the ability to rid the body of excessive Copper and Iron content. The US Food and Drug Administration has approved the use of EDTA for the treatment of lead poisoning.

EDTA Chelation Therapy is effective in the treatment of Peripheral Artery Occlusive Disease (PAOD), where the arteries have been obstructed due to Atherosclerosis and is a perfect alternative to amputation

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: DL-Phenylalanine | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Phenylalanine is an amino acid ranked among the essential amino acids needed to sustain life and critical body functions. It assists in the steady function of the central nervous system.

DL-Phenylalanine is a mixture of equal parts D and L form of Phenylalanine, the D form being a synthetic one crafted in laboratory conditions, and the L form being one that is found in various proteins. Phenylalanine is actually one of very few amino acids that can actually be used while in its D form. Since DL-Phenylalanine is made up of 50/50 D and L parts, it has some of the effects of each form.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: DL-Methionine | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: DL-Methionine is the combined product of L-Methionine and D-Methionine. This is considered an essential amino acid and is necessary in the synthesis of S-Adenosylmethionine. This is not as bioavailable as L-Methionine, but as a result of how little it costs to manufacture, it costs very little to buy. Methionine can be found in large amounts in fish, beans, eggs, brazil nuts, lentils, garlic, yogurt, onions, various meats, as well as some other plants and seeds.

product.titre: D-Aspartic Acid | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
D-Aspartic Acid is an non-essential amino acid which is necessary for the development of the nervous system and the correct functioning of the neuroendocrine system.

D-Aspartic Acid is just a bit less bioavailable than L-Aspartic acid, but it has a much more pronounced effect on increasing the release and the synthesis of testosterone. This is what makes it so accessible and popular in the fields of bodybuilding and athleticism.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Featured, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: Creatine Monohydrate | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Creatine Monohydrate powder is taken from the compound Creatine, which is essential in the process of sending energy directly to muscle. Supplements of Creatine Monohydrate are constantly being studied by nutritionists for their energy creation properties. It is naturally produced by the body in organs such as the liver, pancreas, and kidneys and can be found in areas as diverse as the brain, heart, and all muscle tissue; where it is stored to later provide energy and strength during strenuous exercise. This is what makes this supplement such a popular choice among athletes and bodybuilders. It can be derived from Glycine, Methionine, and Arginine, three very important amino acids, and also from red meats and fish which typically contain about 2-2.5 grams per pound.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: Branch Chain Amino Acids (BCAA) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Branch Chain Amino Acids, most commonly shortened to BCAA, are made up of the amino acids L-Valine, L-Leucine, and L-Isoleucine respectively. These are amino acids that are important to just about everyone, not just for athletes or bodybuilders. While at rest, these amino acids are necessary for promoting the healing of wounds and during exercise, they are known for preventing the breakdown of muscle tissue. When they are working independently, they are just as necessary. Leucine is known for its contribution to wound recovery for injuries sustained by muscles, bones, and even skin; on the other hand Isoleucine is known for boosting the general energy in the body while also helping in production of hemoglobin which is necessary for healing wounds too. Finally, Valine is known for helping to maintain the balance of nitrogen in the body which is necessary for developing muscles.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: Beta Alanine | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Beta Alanine is a powdered product that lends itself well to synthesizing L-Carnosine; which itself is a type of amino acid that provides a host of benefits to anyone involved in much physical activity, such as athletes or bodybuilders.

Studies show that the level of L-Carnosine is raised significantly and the levels of Lactic acid are in turn lowered significantly during physical activity, thanks to the presence of Beta Alanine in the blood stream. Its main use is as a buffer, which prevents acid levels in the body from rising to a level in which they may damage muscle tissue. This means that Beta Alanine can raise the level of overall physical performance when taken as a supplement, by increasing the threshold of lactate. Beta Alanine is the only beta amino acid in the body which it is not necessary to supplement through dietary intake because it is naturally occurring.

product.titre: L-Arginine L-Pyroglutamate | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com

product.titre: L-Aspartic Acid | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Aspartic Acid is generally found in sugar cane. It is a nonessential amino acid (meaning that the body generally manufactures a sufficient enough amount on its own that supplementation is not needed) that acts as a neurotransmitter and has a positive effect on metabolism. The Krebs Cycle would be incomplete without Aspartic Acid. This is what allows for the synthesis of various important amino acids. The Krebs Cycle is eventually what leads to the creation of cellular energy which is important for all types of people, not just athletes. Aspartic Acid is also indirectly involved in the creation of ATP, which fuels all cellular energy throughout the body. Because of the use it has in generating ATP, some experts believe it is very useful for athletes in increasing endurance.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Carnitine Base | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
L-Carnitine is the chief amino acid that helps the body convert fats into energy. It can be stored in many areas from the muscles and the brain, to the heart and sperm, but it is manufactured by the kidneys and liver.

Carnitine is the subject of many studies due to the fact that it is important in the production of energy and the oxidation of fatty acids. Carnitine is transported into the cell’s mitochondria so that it can then be transferred into energy and sent all throughout the body. It is common to find large amounts of Carnitine in the heart because the heart uses the Carnitine to turn fatty acids into energy, which it then uses to push blood throughout the body.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Carnosine | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Carnosine is an amino acid with antioxidant properties which keep healthy cells protected from the damage that could be done by harmful free radicals. It is particularly useful in the eye lenses as it stops the Peroxidation and Glycosylation of lipids.

For those that are not familiar with what this means, Oxidation is the name given to the metabolism of oxygen. The metabolism of oxygen is what eventually leads to the accidental formation of free radicals, which in turn go on to harm the body. Therefore, Carnosine is instrumental in the indirect prevention of free radical damage.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Citrulline | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: L-Citrulline helps athletes to heal after large amounts of exercise in a similar fashion to Creatine, but does so without the negative side effects like bloating and cramps. Citrulline can be found in a lot of different foods including meats, milk, and rind of watermelon. It is also a precursor to Arginine. Arginine can then be used to expel Ammonia from the body and it helps to secrete certain hormones. Nitric oxide, a component used to help cells communicate with one another and a component which helps to relax blood vessels, is dependent upon the existence of Arginine in the body.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Citrulline DL-Malate 1:1 | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
L-Citrulline DL-Malate is a combination of the amino acid, Citrulline; and Malate, the salt of Malic Acid. They intend to provide a person with optimum health benefits that only a combination of these two powerful substances can provide. It is popularly used as a dietary supplement to boost athletic performance and extreme physical exertion by delaying the onset of fatigue and muscle pain.

It helps tired muscles recover fast from fatigue and physical exertion. High ammonia content in the blood causes muscles to tire easily and prevents the conversion of glucose into energy. Taking L-Citrulline DL-Malate removes the Ammonia content from the blood giving the muscles longer-lasting performance and faster recovery time.

product.description: Glutamine is one of the most abundant of all of the 20 amino acids, making up over 60% of all skeletal muscle tissue in the body. It can be found in even higher concentrations in the more vital organs such as the kidneys, liver, heart, and brain. This particular supplement is manufactured in the United States.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Glutamine alpha-Ketoglutarate (AKG) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: This supplement is a combination between glutamine and alpha-ketoglutarate, a chemical derived from glutaric acid. It is used as a way of supplementing glutamine that, when facilitated by alpha-ketoglutarate, is able to bypass the entire digestive system and be absorbed immediately and in great quantities by moving it directly into the blood stream upon consumption rather than filtering through all of the acids and foods in the stomach.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Histidine Base | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Histidine is simply Histidine, an acid native to the stomach that normally helps to promote digestion. Histidine is an essential amino acid and needs to be taken regularly to help with digestion and to maintain digestive health.

Because taking more than the average amount of Histidine may sometimes result in a deflation in the amount of Zinc in the body, it is suggested that a Zinc supplement be taken in tandem with any Histidine supplement. Histidine is one of the top most common of all of the amino acids and can be found in great concentrations within the skeletal muscle.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Isoleucine | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
L-Isoleucine is an essential amino acid and is routinely used by bodybuilders and athletes to improve performance and lengthen exercise regimens through increasing energy and endurance.

L-Isoleucine is one of the five most abundant amino acids that can be found in the skeletal muscles and makes up a total of about one eighth of all proteins in the body. L-Isoleucine is considered essential because the body cannot produce it on its own. It must be supplemented to get its benefits.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Leucine | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
L-Leucine is a type of amino acid which is derived from reactions taking place between pancreatic enzymes and protein. Adults need Leucine to keep nitrogen balanced in their systems while children need it to keep up satisfactory rates of growth.

Valine, Leucine, and Isoleucine make up one of the chains called BCAAs or branch chain amino acids. They make up a large amount of the body’s total protein structure.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Featured, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Lysine HCL | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
L-Lysine HCL is an essential (meaning that it cannot be produced by the body and must be found through dietary means) amino acid and is also one of the most common natural amino acids which are needed by the body to keep up tissue health and general growth. The HCl is added to the base L-Lysine to assist with digestion and to make it more soluble.

Lysine helps in protein synthesis, the creation of new antibodies and in growth and regrowth of new or damaged tissue. Most foods, including meats, and vegetables with high levels of protein are also good sources of Lysine.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Methionine | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Methionine is an essential amino acid. It is needed to help produce SAMe through combination with Adenosine Triphosphate. It can be found in large amounts in fish, beans, eggs, Brazil nuts, lentils, garlic, yogurt, onions, various meats, and some other plants and seeds.

The “essential” in the name essential amino acids is not a joke. These amino acids are very important and of absolute necessity when it comes to sustaining good health. Just about every neurotransmitter in the body as well as about 95% of all hormones in the body are made up of amino acids.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Norvaline | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Norvaline is an analog of the BCAA Valine. It is soluble in water and formed through Leucine synthesis. L-Norvaline is able to block Arginase. By blocking Arginase, this leaves the competing enzyme Arginine to go on and create nitric oxide unimpeded. This nitric oxide is then able to dilate blood vessels, allowing for unimpeded oxygen flow throughout the body especially during intense exercise.

By blocking Arginase, this leaves the competing enzyme Arginine to go on and create nitric oxide unimpeded. This nitric oxide is then able to dilate blood vessels, allowing for unimpeded oxygen flow throughout the body especially during intense exercise.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Ornithine a-ketoglutarate OKG | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
L-Ornithine Alpha-Ketoglutarate (OKG) combines Alpha-Ketoglutaric Acid with Ornithine in order to create OKG which helps increase protein availability and also speeds up the rate and effectiveness of the synthesis of amino acids.

While the body generally produces enough Alpha-Ketoglutaric Acid that supplementation is not needed, it is considered conditionally essential meaning that during intense exercise, levels can be lowered to the point that supplementation may be necessary. This Ornithine based compound is important because it can increase energy, muscle mass, and endurance while slowing the process of muscle catabolism and inhibiting the buildup of fat and muscle fatigue.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Ornithine HCL | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Ornithine is a nonessential amino acid that is created when Arginine is broken down during the Krebs Cycle. It helps aid in exercise and physical exertion along with Arginine and Carnitine. It is nonessential because the body is able to manufacture a sufficient amount of it on its own, but good sources of it may also be found in meats and dairy.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Phenylalanine | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Phenylalanine is an amino acid ranked among the essential amino acids needed to sustain life and critical body functions. It assists in the steady function of the central nervous system.

L-Phenylalanine is derived from natural sources alone, while the D version can only be created in laboratory conditions. L-Phenylalanine can be found in a variety of natural sources, most of the big ones being dairy and meat products including eggs, cheese, yogurt, fish, beef, poultry, etc. The body requires high amounts of Phenylalanine in order to synthesize important neurotransmitters.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Proline | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Proline is a nonessential amino acid and is part of what makes up Collagen. Collagen is a connective tissue that makes up just about 90% of the body’s overall connective tissue. Body parts that collagen is vital in creating and sustaining include skin, ligaments, teeth, bones, and cartilage.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Serine | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Serine is an nonessential amino acid that is meant to increase general health physically and mentally. It assists the main functions of the nervous system and the brain.

L-Serine also helps to produce Phospholipids which then go on to make the material for new cells. Therefore Serine is indirectly involved in the formation of new cells. It also helps to form muscle structures and assists in the regular function of DNA, RNA, and the immune system while helping to metabolize fats and fatty acids. The body creates Serine by synthesizing Glycine or Threonine (as long as levels of Vitamin B6 and B3 are sufficient) and then goes on to create more Cysteine.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Theanine | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: L-Theanine is an amino acid that is naturally found in green tea. Green tea is widely reported as being very healthful and is found in the form of an extract in everything from power bars to ice cream these days. This is because green tea is a source of Polyphenols which have antioxidant properties, keeping healthy cells from being damaged by harmful outside sources like free radicals.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Threonine | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: L-Threonine is a common amino acid, and is very essential (meaning that it must be supplemented or attained through diet) as it is impossible for the body to create it. Threonine is a formative component in collagen, enamel of the teeth, and elastin. It is also needed in order for neurotransmitters to be produced effectively and for the nervous system to stay in good functioning order. L-Threonine also helps support the immune system through assisting in the creation of antibodies.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Tryptophan | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: L-Tryptophan is an essential amino acid (meaning that the body does not produce it, it must be derived from diet or through supplementation). It is needed in order to eventually produce Serotonin and Tryptophan. These messengers are able to transfer nerve impulses between cells. Without having many of these neurotransmitters being produced regularly, the brain would cease to deliver messages and thus cease to function.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Tyrosine | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Tyrosine is one of the non-essential amino acids. L-Tyrosine is traditionally made use of in the process of protein synthesis. It is a nonessential amino acid which means that the body alone can manufacture large enough amounts of it that it need not be supplemented through dietary means. Tyrosine may also be used to form neurotransmitters that feed directly into the brain which scientists have determined may have an effect on cognitive abilities.

Tyrosine may also be used to form neurotransmitters that feed directly into the brain which scientists have determined may have an effect on cognitive abilities.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Valine | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: L-Valine is an amino acid which aids in muscular development and in the regular maintenance of the nervous system. It is one of three BCAAs, the other two being Isoleucine and Leucine. One fourth of overall protein intake in a standard diet is in the form of Branch Chain Amino Acids and the body uses them to support healing of damaged skin and muscles among other things. BCAAs actually make up one third of total protein found in muscles so it is impossible to discount their importance.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: N-Acetyl L-Carnosine | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: N-Acetyl L-Carnosine is a form of Acetylated Carnosine. This benefits the Carnosine in that the addition of the acetyl group makes the overall molecular composition much more stable. This means that it cannot be decimated as easily by Carnosinase, a harmful enzyme which causes Carnosine to be broken down into its less complex components undoing all the work that it took to synthesize it in the first place.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: N-Acetyl L-Cysteine | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: N-Acetyl L-Cysteine is a type of amino acid which is sulfur based and is needed in order for the synthesis of Glutathione to take place. Since Glutathione is a powerful antioxidant, this makes the presence of N-Acetyl L-Cysteine all the more crucial as it indirectly protects against the attacks by harmful free radicals. N-Acetyl L-Cysteine (NAC) is a more bioavailable form of the original L-Cysteine, another kind of sulfur based amino acid type. Unfortunately NAC cannot be found in the diet and needs to be supplemented in order to gain the full benefits. Cysteine alone may be found in a few different types of vegetables and spices, but N-Acetyl L-Cysteine is not available from any sort of dietary source.

product.titre: N-Acetyl L-Tyrosine (NALT) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: N-Acetyl L-Tyrosine (NALT) is derived from L-Tyrosine, one of the non-essential amino acids. It is sometimes regarded as a greater supplement than standard L-Tyrosine because it can be more readily absorbed by the body and it also sticks in the body much longer than standard L-Tyrosine which is often too easily excreted through the urinary tract.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: Taurine | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Taurine is a type of amino acid that is considered semi-essential. This means that it is produced in small quantities by the body, however it is still required to be supplemented through some dietary means every once in a while. It is found very often in energy drinks such as Monster, highly processed iced coffee drinks, and Red Bull. Taurine is useful in dealing with muscle gain and muscle reactions making it a popular supplement for athletes.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Featured, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins
product.titre: Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Vitamin C (or as it is known by its more technical term, Ascorbic Acid) is essential to all of life. Vitamin C is an important factor in many of the body’s various life-giving and life-maintaining functions including the successful operation of the immune system. Unfortunately, Vitamin C is not fat soluble (meaning it cannot be saved in the body’s fat content for later) and it is not something that the body naturally produces. This means that although it is an essential vitamin, it must be replenished every day in order for good health to be maintained. There is at least some Vitamin C content in all fruits and vegetables, though one particular type of fruit that seems to have a higher concentration is fruit in the citrus family. The orange is most closely associated with Vitamin C for this reason.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: N-Acetyl L-Glutamine | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: N-Acetyl L-Glutamine is essentially just a version of L-Glutamine which has been acetylated. Its rate of metabolism and effects on metabolism are considerably more pronounced than those of standard L-Glutamine and it is also has more stability in water. N-Acetyl L-Glutamine is essentially just a more sophisticated transportation system for Glutamine than what Glutamine itself could come up with. Glutamine is one of the most abundant of all of the 20 amino acids, making up over 60% of all skeletal muscle tissue in the body. It can be found in even higher concentrations in more vital organs such as the kidney, liver, heart, and brain.

product.description: N-Acetyl L-Glutamine is essentially just a version of L-Glutamine which has been acetylated. Its rate of metabolism and effects on metabolism are considerably more pronounced than those of standard L-Glutamine and it is also has more stability in water. N-Acetyl L-Glutamine is essentially just a more sophisticated transportation system for Glutamine than what Glutamine itself could come up with. Glutamine is one of the most abundant of all of the 20 amino acids, making up over 60% of all skeletal muscle tissue in the body. It can be found in even higher concentrations in more vital organs such as the kidney, liver, heart, and brain.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins
product.titre: Ascorbyl Palmitate (Vitamin C Ester) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Ascorbyl Palmitate is the product resulting from the combination of Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) with Palmitic Acid. Alone, Vitamin C would normally not be fat soluble, but this mixture known as Ascorbyl Palmitate is fat soluble, meaning that the concentration of Vitamin C taken in with this supplement can be stored in the body for later consumption. Like Vitamin C on its own, Ascorbyl Palmitate is known to work well when combined with Vitamin E by allowing regeneration of this antioxidant to occur more rapidly.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins
product.titre: Beta Carotene 1% (Provitamin A) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Beta Carotene is an antioxidant in the same class as Vitamin E or Vitamin C. It has much the same function as these to expel free radicals throughout the body so that no damage is done to cellular structure due to these molecules running amok.

This compound was derived originally from carrot roots in the early 19th century owing to its deeply orange appearance and the name Carotene. It is one of about six hundred different kinds of Carotenoids, which are pigmented and highly fat soluble compound types that give the deep blue, yellow and red colors to other plants.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Broccoli Extract Powder | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Broccoli Extract powder is a yellowish powder that is derived directly from the essence of broccoli flowers and stems. It has many health benefits associated with it, which may come from the substance known as Sulforaphane which gives the powder its yellow hue. This compound which can be found in all kinds of vegetables such as Broccoli, Cauliflower, Bok Choy, Cabbage, Mustard, Turnips, etc. has been looked at for its correlation to general health benefits.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Calcium Ascorbate (Vitamin C) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Calcium Ascorbate is Vitamin C (otherwise known as ascorbic acid) in a buffered condition. Vitamin C has a natural acidity which can be a little too much to handle for those that have gastrointestinal issues. This is why there is a buffered version, in which the ascorbic acid is reacted with Calcium in order to significantly reduce the acidity of the solution. Not only does this help to reduce the acidity, but it also allows the beneficial effects of Calcium to reach your body along with those of the Vitamin C.

product.titre: Choline Bitartrate | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Choline Bitartrate is what is known as a Lipotropic compound. It is part of the Vitamin B category and is well soluble in water.

Compounds classified as Lipotropic are crucial to the stable functioning of the liver, as they have the capability of converting fats that are transported there into energy. Bitartrate, also known as Tartaric Acid, is combined with Choline in this compound which helps to increase the overall rate of absorption into the body. This compound is also indirectly responsible for helping to maintain cellular structure and integrity as it is involved in the synthesis of compounds which keep the cell membranes healthy. The human body is capable of producing limited amounts of Choline naturally on its own, but these are often not enough to constitute full servings.

product.titre: Cinnamon Bark Powder Extract | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Cinnamon Bark powder extract is, as the name implies, extracted from cinnamon tree bark, specifically from the Cinnamomum Wilsonii gamble tree. Cinnamon Bark extract serves as a very useful antioxidant, keeping cells safe from harmful free radicals. It also keeps blood sugar levels regular by supporting even insulin production in the body.

product.titre: Coenzyme Q10 (COQ10) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Coenzyme Q10 is a substance known as a quinone, which is essential in providing energy to the body at a cellular level. It was first found in 1957, and nicknamed ubiquinone by the researchers that discovered it due to the fact that it was found in every cell in the body, and the word 'ubi' means everywhere. Even though mitochondria are the actual cellular bodies responsible for producing energy, quinones are the water insoluble substances responsible for stimulating the mitochondria into working in the first place.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Curcumin 95% Natural Turmeric Extract | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Turmeric, while not typically associated with the spice that is derived from it, has actually been used popularly as a healing agent and as a condiment of sorts for many years.

Turmeric is usually found in Asian countries particularly in the southeast, as well as parts of India. It is part of the family that also contains cardamom and ginger root. The chief active ingredient in Turmeric is known as Curcumin which is itself, simply a mixture of various Phytonutrients which are referred to individually as Curcuminoids. These are what give Turmeric powder its distinct deep yellow coloring. Three of the most important Curcuminoids are found in Turmeric and provide strong antioxidant power, perfect for helping to neutralize free radicals, molecules which roam around the body harming healthy cells.

product.titre: Curcumin 95% Natural Turmeric Extract | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Turmeric, while not typically associated with the spice that is derived from it, has actually been used popularly as a healing agent and as a condiment of sorts for many years.

Turmeric is usually found in Asian countries particularly in the southeast, as well as parts of India. It is part of the family that also contains cardamom and ginger root. The chief active ingredient in Turmeric is known as Curcumin which is itself, simply a mixture of various Phytonutrients which are referred to individually as Curcuminoids. These are what give Turmeric powder its distinct deep yellow coloring. Three of the most important Curcuminoids are found in Turmeric and provide strong antioxidant power, perfect for helping to neutralize free radicals, molecules which roam around the body harming healthy cells.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Grape Seed Extract | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Grape Seed Extract is beneficial for humans in that it contains Antioxidants, Procyanidins, and Polyphenols which all serve to protect healthy cells from being damaged by rogue molecules called free radicals.

This particular extract is taken from the seeds of the Vitis Vinifera, L. This is a type of grape plant that is usually used to make wine. Polyphenols are particularly strong antioxidants and can be found in high concentrations within the seed of this plant, which is where this extract is derived from. It also has Flavonoids, which have Antioxidant properties as well, and Phytochemicals which are known to have effectiveness to rival the standard Vitamins C, and E.
