product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins
product.titre: Inositol Hexaphosphate | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Inositol Hexaphosphate is the main vehicle through which phosphorus is stored in plant tissues. Seeds and bran make the most use out of Inositol Hexaphosphate. It is sometimes called IP6, Phytate, or Phytic acid when it is in the form of a salt.

Inositol Hexaphosphate is part of the B vitamin chain. IP6, the direct derivative of Inositol Hexaphosphate, is a necessary ingredient in the tissues of many types of legumes, with soybeans having the highest concentration. This makes soybeans one of the greatest sources of nutritionally derived IP6 along with other high fiber foods such as cereals, beans, corn, tofu, oatmeal, brown rice, and peanuts, just to name a few. Inositol Hexaphosphate is highly effective as an antioxidant and helps the immune system to be more effective.

product.titre: Lutein 5% | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Lutein is an antioxidant that is found in the Carotenoid family. This same group also has Beta-Carotene, Alpha-Carotene, and Lycopene among it, as well as others. It is often found in large concentrations in vegetables. The darker the pigment of the vegetable, the more Lutein is likely in it. This is because like the other Carotenoids it actually adds to the pigment of the fruit or vegetable. Not like the other Carotenoids, Lutein is the only one which is not converted into Vitamin A when digested. The main purpose of Lutein is to help shield the eye from the sun’s harmful UV rays. There is a large amount of Lutein present in the retina already. However, its abilities as an antioxidant help to protect the body in general from damage due to free radical presence.

product.titre: N,N, Dimethyl Glycine Anhydrous | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: N,N-Dimethyl Glycine anhydrous is derived from the original amino acid Glycine through a process known as Demethylization. The structure of its chemical makeup closely resembles that of Choline. Dimethylglycine is part of the B-chain of vitamins and is labeled Vitamin B15. It is also known to be called Pangamic Acid and can assist in reducing recovery time after difficult exercise and also improving the body’s ability to intake and use oxygen. Similar to the effects of Betaine, Dimethyl Glycine is able to donate a methyl in enzymatic reactions that take place at a cellular level. This ability to donate methyl is very crucial in the synthesis and production of important brain chemicals. It can also help to increase energy and help with general feelings of health and mental stability.

product.description: N,N-Dimethylglycine HCL is derived from the original amino acid Glycine through a process known as Demethylization. The structure of its chemical makeup is very similar to Choline, a related chemical. Dimethglycine is part of the B-chain of vitamins, and thus is given the name Vitamin B-15. It is also known to be called Pangamic Acid and can be useful in reducing recovery time after difficult exercise and also improving the body’s ability to intake and use oxygen. Similar to the effects of Betaine, Dimethylglycine is able to donate a methyl towards necessary enzymatic reactions. This ability to donate one of its methyl's is very crucial in the synthesis and production of important brain chemicals. Decent levels of Glycine in the body are responsible for a general overall feeling of health or well being.

product.titre: Para-AminoBenzoic Acid (PABA) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Para-Aminobenzoic Acid (also called PABA) is a type of amino acid which is not related to proteins and can be found naturally in a number of different places. It can be found in large stores from such sources as eggs, rice, spinach, molasses, and wheat germ. This amino acid is imbued with the capability of absorbing harmful ultraviolet rays from the sun making it a perfect ingredient for commercial sunscreens. However, this is not its only purpose in the body.

product.titre: Pine Bark Extract | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Pine Bark Extract contains Proanthocyanidin which is a Bioflavonoid, another type of antioxidant. This particular extract is derived from the Pinis Massoniana tree. Antioxidants are very important to the body because they are able to protect healthy cells from being damaged by what is known as free radicals. These are molecules that are created during the natural metabolic process which see to harm healthy cells.

product.titre: Alpha Lipoic Acid (R-ALA) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Alpha-Lipoic Acid, sometimes referred to as R-ALA, is a powerful antioxidant that is naturally produced by the human body. It is instrumental in facilitating the transfer of the sugar glucose into consumable energy which can then be used as fuel for the body. R-ALA is simply a rearranged compound of the ALA variety and fatty acid that happens to be bioavailable while at the same time functioning as an essential antioxidant. This compound can be found not only in the body, but in many green vegetables and meat types.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Pure Resveratrol | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Resveratrol is a compound found in red grapes, specifically in the skin of wine grapes. It is not exclusive to red grapes by any means and may even be found in other berries and plants. It use is mainly to protect plants from rapidly developing mold when in environments that mold typically grows in. It also shields plants against UV radiation and against the drying effect that drought has, but only to some degree in those cases. It cannot work forever. In addition, Resveratrol also functions as an antioxidant, protecting cells against free radical damage.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Rutin Powder | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Rutin powder is a type of Flavonoid which gives certain plants their color. It also possesses the abilities of an antioxidant, allowing it to defend healthy cells from the harmful effects of free radicals.

Rutin is one of the most important Flavonoids in an entire group of Bioflavonoids. Some other important ones include Catechins, which can be found in red wine and in tea, particularly green tea due to the way it is processed.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins
product.titre: Vitamin E Powder 700IU | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Vitamin E is an antioxidant known for being extremely effective at what it does and at being very fat soluble. It is able to protect healthy cells from sustaining damage from free radicals which may seek to harm them.

One little known fact is that Vitamin E is not a single agent, but it is actually a name given to a variety of different compounds which are individually part of a family of Tocopherols and Tocotrienols. Each of these compounds has its own job and its own level of importance in the body.

product.titre: Zinc Gluconate | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Zinc Gluconate is one of the more highly preferred supplements for zinc due to its relatively high bioavailability and its ease on the stomach. It is made up of one atom of zinc and two atoms of Gluconate for every molecule in this compound.

Zinc is useful for a variety of reasons. It is able to keep the immune system healthy, along with the digestive and reproductive systems. It also carries out many other important tasks such as cell reproduction, balancing of hormones, and absorbing vitamins and minerals correctly, not to mention the synthesis of proteins, making this a very important mineral.

product.description: Zinc Oxide is a compound made up of a single atom of Zinc bound to a single atom of Oxygen. product.titre: Betaine HCL | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Like Betaine Anhydrous, Betaine Hydrochloride has a chemical structure which can be likened to that of Choline, and it is a form of Glycine which has gone through the process of trimethylization. This type of chemical must be industrially manufactured and synthesized meaning it is not a substance that can be found naturally as with many other supplements. It is a combination of the more commonly found Betaine as well as Hydrocholoric acid. Betaine is a byproduct that is obtained during the metabolism of Choline in the body and it can also be naturally found in different foods such as wheat, sugar beets, spinach, and other sources rich in protein. HCL is found naturally within the stomach and is a gastric acid used to help break down of proteins while protecting the intestines from erosion and disease caused by bacteria.

product.titre: Chlorella Blue-Green Algae | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Chlorella Algae (or as it is known scientifically, Chlorella Pyrenoidosa) is a unicellular plant found in fresh water and is the size of a single human blood cell. It possesses a blue-green color because of the excessive amounts of Chlorophyll present in its molecular structure. It is an ancient food and has been consumed for just about as many years as there has been life on this planet.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Copper Gluconate Anhydrous 1% | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Copper Gluconate is a derivative of both Copper Carbonate and Gluconic acid, with a Mannitol carrier added to bring the level of elemental Copper down to 1% so that it is fit for public consumption. It exists to make sure there is always and abundant amount of Copper in the body, which is necessary to preserve correct system functions. Copper is not only essential for humans but for all living organisms, including plants, due to its presence in many different enzymes which all assist in many vital processes in the human body.

product.titre: Copper Gluconate Anhydrous 1% | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Copper L-Aspartate 1% | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Copper L-Aspartate 1% is the synthesized product of L-Aspartic Acid and Cupric Carbonate with a generous portion of Mannitol added to the mixture to keep the level of Copper at 1%.

Copper and L-Aspartic Acid are both naturally occurring in the body, making them very bioavailable, while Mannitol is present merely as a carrier. In fact, Copper is actually among the most abundant minerals found in the human body. Its presence is no accident either as it is absolutely essential for all bodily functions to operate correctly in all living organisms including plants. In this compound, the Aspartic Acid component is included in order to facilitate the even transportation of minerals throughout the body, which is also done through a protein called Ceruloplasmin.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins
product.titre: Vitamin A Palmitate | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Vitamin A Palmitate is one of the main components that make up palm oil. It is sometimes called Retinyl Palmitate, as it is a synthetic alternative to the Retinyl Acetate normally found in Vitamin A supplements. Normally Vitamin A is highly unstable alone. This is why it is reacted along with Methyl Palmitate in order to stabilize it. Vitamin A is often used as an additive in low fat milk in order to make up for the vitamin content which is lost when the fat is lost. It functions as a simple antioxidant, protecting the body against harm from harmful free radicals.

product.titre: Beta Sitosterol (Plant Sterol) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Beta Sitosterol is a type of alcohol that functions similar to a steroid. It is sometimes referred to as Plant Phytosterol because it is naturally occurring in plants such as corn, various seeds and nuts, rice, wheat germ, and other fruits and vegetables. It is a compound much like cholesterol; and plant sterols such as Beta Sitosterol are known for helping to maintain healthy immune and cardiovascular systems.

product.titre: Betaine Anhydrous Trimethylglycine (TMG) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Betaine Anhydrous is a derivative of Choline and is an important nutrient which assists with various chemical processes in the body via the carrying and donation of methyl molecules throughout the system. It is also known as Trimethylglycine, or TMG for short.

The name Betaine Anhydrous is derived from sugar beets, the vegetable in which it was first identified. Its availability is not limited to sugar beets though, as it can be found in many different dietary sources including but not limited to, beans and legumes, grains present in breakfast cereals, wine, seafood, and leafy green vegetables.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Nattokinase | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Nattokinase is derived from the popular Japanese culinary sensation known as Natto. The texture of Natto is much like cheese; however it has little to do with dairy products, as it is derived from soybeans which have undergone intense fermentation. The usefulness of Nattokinase was discovered in the 1980’s when it was originally extracted from fermented soybeans. This process of extraction involves the fermentation of the soybeans via the bacteria called Bacillus Natto. Nattokinase is produced as a byproduct of this interaction between the bacteria and the soybeans.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Nattokinase | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Nattokinase is derived from the popular Japanese culinary sensation known as Natto. The texture of Natto is much like cheese; however it has little to do with dairy products, as it is derived from soybeans which have undergone intense fermentation. The usefulness of Nattokinase was discovered in the 1980’s when it was originally extracted from fermented soybeans. This process of extraction involves the fermentation of the soybeans via the bacteria called Bacillus Natto. Nattokinase is produced as a byproduct of this interaction between the bacteria and the soybeans.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins
product.titre: Niacin (Vitamin B3) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Niacin is more commonly referred to as Vitamin B3. There are two different types of Niacin that are used in order to supplement Vitamin B3 which include Niacin and Niacinamide. Each of them plays an important role in the metabolism of energy in that they may be converted into Coenzymes. Once converted, enzymes in each cell can make use of completing the actions that create energy for the body. These Coenzymes have been named NAD and NADH respectively. Taken in amounts of about 100mg or less, both Niacin and Niacinamide ostensibly perform the same actions. When taken at levels greater than 100mg though, this is where their overall effects begin to differ. Niacin is essential in balancing and maintaining the levels of good HDL Cholesterol in the body, while also regulating the levels of bad LDL Cholesterol present in the blood.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Red Yeast Rice Extract (RYR) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Red Yeast Rice Extract, as you may have guessed, is a derivative of red yeast which grows on rice. It has found widespread use by being served along with food in Asian countries, with people consuming between 15 and 55 grams a day depending on the country. Not only is it used in food as a flavoring agent, but it is even able to promote good circulation and a healthy heart in medicine.

product.titre: Bearberry Leaf Extract 4:1 (Uva Ursi) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Bearberry Leaf is a type of shrub that grows perennially and can be found in Europe, Asia, and parts of North America. It is a plant that helps in erosion control of soil and therefore can be found growing in many different types of gardens all around the world.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Bearberry Leaf Extract 4:1 (Uva Ursi) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Bearberry Leaf is a type of shrub that grows perennially and can be found in Europe, Asia, and parts of North America. It is a plant that helps in erosion control of soil and therefore can be found growing in many different types of gardens all around the world. One of the nicknames associated with the Bearberry shrub is “Kinnikinnick” which should sound familiar to anyone well acquainted with the art of gardening.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Chastetree Berry Extract 5:1 | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Chastetree Berry is the fruit of a flowering shrub which is used to treat premenstrual syndrome, symptoms of menopause, low production of milk and breast pain (mastalgia).

During the middle ages, the Chastetree Berry was considered to be an anaphrodisiac, a substance that suppresses libido and sex drive. It was named "Chasteberry" to signify that eating the berry promotes chastity and sexual abstinence.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: The name Ginkgo Biloba has become such a popular title in recent years, that most people are now aware of its usage in Chinese healing practices for a thousand years. In fact, the Ginkgo Biloba tree has been tested and found to be among the list of the oldest types of trees in the world. There are fossil records which indicate that this tree has been around as far back as 200 million years, with some individual Ginkgo Biloba trees living as long as 1000 years, or even more in some cases. Of course, this 24% leaf powder extract has only been around for about 30 years.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Hoodia Gordonii | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Hoodia Gordonii is a type of flowering cactus that is found mainly in the South African Kalahari Desert. Natives of the Kalahari Desert used the plant to keep their appetites regulated when they were on long treks. The plant is somewhat rare these days, so it has come under control by conservation services. However, this product is exported legally out of South Africa.

product.titre: Horsetail Extract Powder | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Horsetail is a weed that looks very much like a fern and can be found all throughout a wide area including Asia, Europe, North America, and the Middle East. The botanical name for it, Equisetum Arvense L. comes from the word 'Equus' (Latin for horse) and 'Seta' (Latin for bristle).

product.titre: LongJack Extract 100:1 | Pure Powder or Capsules | BulkSupplements.com
product.description:
Longjack is a plant extract which has been used for hundreds of years mostly in Malaysia and Asia as a way of increasing general well-being and helping to boost overall physical performance through increasing energy and stamina.

Longjack is an extract of a tree which is able to grow a maximum of 30 feet. The scientific name of the tree is Eurycoma Longifolia Jack and it can be found in Myanmar, Thailand, Cambodia, Laos, and other areas around that part of the world.

Longjack is an extract of a tree which is able to grow a maximum of 30 feet. The scientific name of the tree is Eurycoma Longifolia Jack and it can be found in Myanmar, Thailand, Cambodia, Laos, and other areas around that part of the world.

product.titre: Red Clover Extract Powder | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Red Clover is a perennial plant which is seen throughout Asia and Europe and it has recently been brought to North America. It is the tops of the Red Clover plant that flower, and thus it is the tops that are dried and then administered for a variety of medical uses. Red Clover is known for providing support for both the respiratory and circulatory systems. The liver and the skin may also make use of Red Clover for cleansing and strengthening purposes.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: Rhodiola Rosea 3% Rosavin | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Rhodiola Rosea is a plant distinguished by its propensity towards growing in colder climates, such as the Rocky Mountains, and certain arctic regions. It is also particularly recognized for its ability to have a calming effect on a person or creature that is consuming it. It contains 17 different amino acids that are all necessary in promoting vital bodily functions. Not only that, but it also has a generous helping of Flavonoids (important antioxidant molecules), Phenylpropanoids, Essential oils, and Tannins.

product.description: Senna grows in Arabic nations predominately, but can also be found in Africa and India. It was named Senna by Arabic scientists that studied the shrub, using it as a way to purge the systems of anyone afflicted with any kind of stomach or bodily toxin.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: St John's Wort | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
St. John's Wort is a kind of plant that has been popularly used as herbal medicine since the Middle Ages for the treatment of mild to severe depression. The ancient people would use St. John's Wort to treat skin disorders, neuralgia, severe burns, muscle pain and various types of headaches. It is widely used in Europe especially in Germany for the treatment of depressive disorders among teenagers and children.

It contains the phytochemicals, Hyperforin and Hypericin as its main ingredients and are responsible for giving this supplement its antidepressant and anxiolytic properties. The antidepressant characteristics of St. John's Wort is mainly attributed to its Hyperforin content, while Hypericin is associated with the herbal medicine's photosensitive properties.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: White Willow Bark Extract 15% | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: White Willow (sometimes called Salicin Willow) has many health benefits associated with it that have kept it prized among the medicinal community for thousands of years. It is usually used as a pain reliever. In fact, usage of this White Willow Bark specifically for its healing properties can be traced back to the ancient Greeks. Hippocrates, a famous philosopher, advised his followers and others to chew the bark in order to alleviate their pains. Greece is not the only place that has made use of the bark of the White Willow tree historically though. It has been recorded as being used in Asia and throughout Europe.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Calcium Carbonate (USA) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Calcium is essential to have circulating throughout the body periodically in order to maintain healthy bones and strong teeth, facilitate fast and efficient blood clotting, and to transmit nerve impulses correctly.

The best way to maintain healthy levels of Calcium is to have a Calcium balanced diet. Suggested serving size for calcium is about 1000mg daily as recommended by the FDA, and since a single serving of any type of dairy generally contains about 300mg of Calcium, someone who has about four servings of dairy on a daily basis need not supplement their diet with any more.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Calcium Citrate | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: There are several different supplements which contain Calcium including Calcium Carbonate, Calcium Lactate, Calcium Gluconate, Calcium Lactate Gluconate, Calcium Citrate, and Calcium Pyruvate. While each of these supplements does contain some part Calcium, the amount of Calcium found in each is dependent upon the absorption capabilities and concentrations of the other chemicals in the compound. Calcium Citrate, containing about 21% Calcium is higher up on the list than most in terms of overall Calcium content, and has the most efficient absorption capabilities. When trying to select a Calcium product though, absorption rates are not the only factors that should be taken into account. Other important factors include solubility, bioavailability, cost, specific health conditions of the buyer, and any other drugs or supplements being taken by this individual that have the potential to interact with this supplement.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Calcium Gluconate | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Calcium Gluconate is essentially just a synthesis of Calcium and Gluconic Acid.

There are a few different compounds which contain Calcium, and these are Calcium Carbonate, Calcium Gluconate, Calcium Pyruvate, and Calcium Lactate Gluconate. While each does provide Calcium, the amounts of elemental Calcium within each vary considerably. For example, Calcium Carbonate has 40% Calcium, while Calcium Citrate only has 21%. Calcium L-Lactate has 13%; which is more than Calcium Gluconate, which only has 9% Calcium content. This plays a major role in the decision about which one to purchase, however, it must be kept in mind that this is only one factor which may affect your purchase. Other things to take into account are absorption rates, bioavailability, reactions with other drugs or supplements, height and weight of the user and even flavor or taste.

product.titre: Caffeine Powder (Synthetic) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
WARNING! CAFFEINE is HIGHLY TOXIC in higher quantities. Excess use with as little as a few grams may result in death. DO NOT use more than 200 milligrams (mg) of caffeine in a single serving, or more than 600 milligrams (mg) in a day. Accurate measurement requires a milligram weight scale. Do not take if you have a history of heart disease, or if you are pregnant or nursing. Consult your physician before taking this product.

Caffeine is the most popular psychoactive substance in the world. While it may not seem like it, Caffeine is in fact considered a psychoactive substance due to its extreme mind altering abilities in large doses. About 90% of all adults in America have Caffeine included in their daily diet.

Caffeine is one of very few psychoactive substances that are legal and unregulated. The classification of Caffeine Anhydrous as it is listed in the FDA database is as a multipurpose food additive, making it safe for consumption in general. While Caffeine is normally listed on the label for soft drinks, this is because it is only required to be listed on a product when it is as an additive. In sources where Caffeine has been naturally derived such as in coffee, tea, some nuts, etc, it is not required to list the Caffeine content on the label or packaging.

product.titre: DMAE-Bitartrate | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
DMAE Bitartrate, which is sometimes referred to as Deanol, is an antioxidant. It occurs naturally, is similar to Choline on a purely chemical basis, and has two methyl groups.

It has been found that by increasing levels of DMAE, this will result in an increase in the levels of Choline in the brain. Even though Choline is not technically considered a vitamin; it shares many commonalities and works closely with the Vitamin B chain, and is very well associated with it for this reason. It is a precursor to Acetylcholine, and is useful in getting rid of the excess fat which tends to accumulate in the liver. Choline can be found in very high levels in breast milk.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: Gamma Aminobutyric Acid (GABA) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Gamma Aminobutyric Acid (GABA for short) is possibly the most essential of all of the nutrients deemed nonessential. It is essential for brain functioning, particularly in order to promote feelings of calmness and peace. GABA is classified as an inhibitory neurotransmitter (a substance which allows messages to be communicated at a cellular level within the nervous system) and is found all throughout the brain. It is created from Glutamic Acid being assisted by Vitamin B6. GABA is created from the reaction that takes place between GAD (Glutamic Acid Decarboxylase) and Vitamin B6. GABA is essential in triggering the actions of a few different muscles and in maintaining their levels of activity.

product.titre: Hyaluronic Acid (Na Hyaluronate) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Hyaluronic Acid (Sodium Hyaluronate) is sometimes referred to as nature’s moisturizer due to its use as a bodily lubricant and the fact that it is one of the most hydrophilic naturally occurring molecules. It keeps the joints of the human body well lubricated so that in the event of heavy exercise, the bones do not begin rubbing together and causing damage to one another. Not only that, but Hyaluronic Acid also has an effect on the way injury is handled by the body. It is the presence of Hyaluronic Acid that stops painful joints from occurring. Low levels of HA will eventually cause joint pain if it is not supplemented.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins
product.titre: Inositol (Vitamin B8) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Inositol or as it is most commonly called, Vitamin B8, is a vitamin that is essential to sustaining life and cellular health throughout the body. It is classified as a lipid, is water soluble, and is necessary to improve the effectiveness of a variety of reactions that take place at a cellular level. Despite how important it is to the body, as a nutrient it is actually considered nonessential due to the fact that it can actually be synthesized from Glucose by bacteria present in the intestine.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Featured, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Methylsulfonylmethane (MSM) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Methylsulfonylmethane, or as it is sometimes referred to, MSM, is a Sulfur compound which has been found to occur naturally in the human body; in milk, fish, green vegetables, and in various grains. It is usually sold as a dietary supplement. MSM can be found in some form in all living creatures including plant life, and is usually described as both without taste or smell. The extract generally comes in the form of a white crystalline powder which can be dissolved in water.

product.titre: Phenylethylamine HCL | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Phenylethylamine (PEA) HCL is what is known as a neuromodulator. This means that it is able to control the hormones in the body, releasing more Acetylcholine and Dopamine, thereby stimulating the brain to feel certain moods, deal with stress, and focus on things. PEA is derived from L-Phenylalanine through the process of Decarboxylation.

Phenylethylamine Hydrochloride can be found in such food sources as chocolate, but unfortunately the body’s natural metabolic process is too rapid for PEA HCL to actually be absorbed into the system correctly. Therefore, food sources are not ideal for the purposes of supplementing PEA HCL.

product.titre: Phenylethylamine HCL | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Phenylethylamine (PEA) HCL is what is known as a neuromodulator. This means that it is able to control the hormones in the body, releasing more Acetylcholine and Dopamine, thereby stimulating the brain to feel certain moods, deal with stress, and focus on things. PEA is derived from L-Phenylalanine through the process of Decarboxylation.

Phenylethylamine Hydrochloride can be found in such food sources as chocolate, but unfortunately the body’s natural metabolic process is too rapid for PEA HCL to actually be absorbed into the system correctly. Therefore, food sources are not ideal for the purposes of supplementing PEA HCL.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Spirulina Powder | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Spirulina Plantensis is an edible food supplement version of a microscopic algae organism with a blue-green hue. Each organism is made up of a single cell, and can be found in a variety of different watery environments including marine, tropical, and salt pan regions.

This plant is considered one of the earliest forms of life and goes back many millions of years. It can be consumed as a food, or as a food supplement. Humans have been using it for centuries because it has a wide variety of vitamins and nutrients present in it and can help people sustain their lives and general well being on a budget. Even though it is difficult to farm, because of its popularity it is making way for a new type of farming dedicated purely towards microorganisms since this alone is such a useful food source.

product.description: Pantothenic Acid or as it is usually referred to, Vitamin B5, is a water soluble vitamin that is actually necessary for sustaining life. This is especially true for humans who need Pantothenic Acid to facilitate the activity of a variety of life sustaining enzymes.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins
product.titre: Biotin 1% (Vitamin B7) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Biotin 1% is essentially a mixture of both DiCalcium Phosphate and Biotin. In this mixture, Biotin takes the role of acting as Vitamin B7 which is an essential nutrient for the body.

Biotin is by far one of the most essential nutrients that humans, plants, and just about all other living organisms must consistently consume because of all of the complex operations it is involved in. Unfortunately the only organisms that can correctly synthesize it happen to be plants, such as algae and mold as well as yeast and bacteria. The attribute that makes Biotin so essential is that it assists in the transfer of carbon dioxide meaning without it, the body would not be able to correctly metabolize fat and carbohydrates.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins
product.titre: Pure Biotin (Vitamin B7) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Unlike Biotin 1% which has a 99% Mannitol filler, Biotin pharmaceutical grade has no fillers meant to make it more robust, and it is not cut with anything else. It is a very potent form of the Vitamin B7.

Biotin is one of the most important chemicals that is made use of in the physiological processes of humans, animals, plants and just about all other living organisms. Also those synthesized from plants, algae, molds, and bacteria, it indirectly assists in the transfer of carbon dioxide by acting as a Coenzyme; therefore acting as an essential ingredient in the metabolic process for fats and carbohydrates, which breaks them down to be used as energy later.

product.titre: Riboflavin (Vitamin B2) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Riboflavin is another name for Vitamin B2. It is a necessary ingredient in many different metabolic processes that help to sustain cells with energy and also keep them healthy and growing. It does this by turning fats, proteins, and carbohydrates into energy post-metabolism by synthesizing sterols and fatty acids. Also, in terms of how it interacts with outside forces such as heat and acid, it is far more stable than the other B chain vitamin, B1 which is prone to act up on occasion.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins
product.titre: Vitamin B1 (Thiamine HCL) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Vitamin B1 provides the body with a source of Thiamine to use in the process of breaking down carbohydrates so that they may be used as an energy source by the body. Thiamine is also necessary for amino acids to be properly metabolized. When a person’s diet is such that carbohydrates make up their main source of energy, this will require the body to produce more Thiamine, or if this is not possible, for more Thiamine to be supplemented. Thiamine does not just process sugars and essential amino acids; it also helps to metabolize fats and proteins. Adenosine triphosphate is a chemical that is produced in the body. It not only provides energy to muscles during times of intense exercise, but it absorbs energy while it is doing this so that at a later time, the energy can be dispersed and used. Without adenosine triphosphate people would grow exhausted soon after exercising and would have to eat immediately to replenish enough energy to simply walk home after a workout. Vitamin B1 is responsible for indirectly facilitating the process that goes on to create ATP via the creation of Thiamine pyrophosphate, making it quite the important vitamin.

product.description: Vitamin B1 provides the body with a source of Thiamine to use in the process of breaking down carbohydrates so that they may be used as an energy source by the body. Thiamine is also necessary for amino acids to be properly metabolized. When a person’s diet is such that carbohydrates make up their main source of energy, this will require the body to produce more Thiamine, or if this is not possible, for more Thiamine to be supplemented. Thiamine does not just process sugars and essential amino acids; it also helps to metabolize fats and proteins. Adenosine triphosphate is a chemical that is produced in the body. It not only provides energy to muscles during times of intense exercise, but it absorbs energy while it is doing this so that at a later time, the energy can be dispersed and used. Without adenosine triphosphate people would grow exhausted soon after exercising and would have to eat immediately to replenish enough energy to simply walk home after a workout. Vitamin B1 is responsible for indirectly facilitating the process that goes on to create ATP via the creation of Thiamine pyrophosphate, making it quite the important vitamin.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins
product.titre: Vitamin B12 (Pure Cyanocobalamin) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Cyanocobalamin is another name for the B chain vitamin, Vitamin B12 (also called cobalamin due to the fact that it is a chief component that makes up cobalt). It can be dissolved in water and once it is consumed it is stored in the liver and aids in the transfer of food into energy. Of all of the vitamins in the body, this is considered the strongest. The liver is not the only place that Vitamin B12 is stored though; it can also be found in the kidneys and various other tissues. Most water soluble nutrients and vitamins are usually quickly expelled through the urinary tract, making Vitamin B12 fairly unique in this regard. Like other B-chain vitamins, Vitamin B12 is not actually its own vitamin but rather, it is a group comprised of compounds known as corrinoids.

Vitamin B12 is often used as a food additive as its properties allow food to be converted more easily into energy when consumed. This is especially true for foods that are rich in protein since the Vitamin B12 is meant to bind to protein molecules. HCL in the stomach acid then breaks down the foods, allowing the Vitamin B12 to be released from the proteins and then go on to help the body use the newly digested food as energy.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins
product.titre: Vitamin B12 (Pure Cyanocobalamin) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Cyanocobalamin is another name for Vitamin B12, a compound noted for its strength. After consumption, it is stored in the liver and aids in the transfer of food into energy. The liver is not the only place that Vitamin B12 is stored, however; it can also be found in the kidneys and various other tissues. Most water-soluble nutrients and vitamins are usually quickly expelled through the urinary tract, making Vitamin B12 fairly unique.

Excluding fortified foods, the only sources of Vitamin B12 that might be considered reliable are sources from dairy or meat. Vitamin B12 is released during digestion because it is bound to proteins and must be broken down by stomach acids in order for it to be released. If someone has weak stomach acid or a reduced gastric acid output, it may be difficult to get the necessary daily value of Vitamin B12 from natural sources. This is why multivitamins and supplements exist.

This product is Kosher certified.

product.titre: Vitamin B3 (Niacinamide Powder) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Niacinamide, or as it is more commonly referred to, Vitamin B3, belongs to the group of B vitamins and is water soluble. product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins
product.titre: Vitamin B6 (Pyridoxine HCL) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Pyridoxine is just another term for Vitamin B6. It is an essential vitamin for everyone, especially women, as it has been specifically tied to balancing hormones in women.

Vitamin B6 is actually a combination of three different compounds, which may all be found in certain foods. These include Pyridoxine, Pyridoxamine, and Pyroxidal. The bioactive form which is found most commonly is Pyridoxal. However, Pyridoxine is the one that is typically found in supplements as it costs the least to produce and may be manufactured in great more abundance than the others can be found in.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins
product.titre: Vitamin D3 (cholecalciferol) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Vitamin D3 is an important nutrient and is responsible for regulating calcium levels, thereby maintaining the health of all things calcium related from teeth to bones to cartilage. It is produced naturally in the body and is a comprehensive hormone that deals with all things calcium associated. It is able to regulate the way that calcium is absorbed into the body and then how it is incorporated into various areas that need it.

It is able to regulate the way that calcium is absorbed into the body and then how it is incorporated into various areas that need it.

product.titre: Beta Carotene 8% (Provitamin A) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Beta-Carotene is classified as a carotenoid, and the most popularly known Provitamin A carotenoid. It is a yellow-orange pigment that gives the distinctive color to yellow-orange fruits and vegetables, such as pumpkins, carrots, sweet potatoes, oranges, bananas, tomatoes and squash. It is also the pigment that gives the bright orange color to cooked lobsters, and the bright pink color to salmon and flamingos.

Beta-Carotene exerts its function both as an antioxidant and anticancer supplement by trapping free radicals that could cause damage to the body. An article in the New England Journal of Medicine reported that diets which have been fortified with Beta-Carotene-rich fruits and vegetables can protect against lung cancer, although it has very little favorable effect on cancer in general.

product.titre: Diindolylmethane (DIM) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Diindolylmethane (DIM) is a byproduct of the naturally occurring breakdown of glucobrassicin, which can be found in sources like cauliflower, broccoli, and other cruciferous vegetables. The only way to get the real benefits of DIM is to eat these vegetables raw. Cooking vegetables causes many nutrients to be lost in the process. In the case of cruciferous vegetables, the enzyme myrosinase, which causes this conversion from glucobrassicin to DIM to occur, becomes lost in the process. Thus, vegetables must be consumed raw in order to get the benefits of DIM which include its antioxidant properties, and various other health promoting qualities.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Grapefruit Seed Extract | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Grapefruit Seed Extract abbreviated to GSE, is a supplement which is known for its ability to act as an antioxidant. The seed of a grapefruit has components that make it up at a molecular level, including flavonoids (the chief source of the antioxidant properties that Grapefruit Seed Extract has), sources of Vitamin C and E, limonoids, sterols, citric acid, and various minerals. Flavonoids are particularly useful here because they are able to neutralize free radicals that roam throughout the body doing harm to healthy cells.

product.titre: Melatonin | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Melatonin is a hormone that is created within the pineal gland that controls the way the brain keeps track of time during sleep. It is melatonin that tells you when it is time to go to sleep and when it is time to wake up. It is actually brought on by exposure to darkness and it is exposure to light that keeps it from acting up during the day when it shouldn't be needed.

product.titre: Quercetin Dihydrate | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Quercetin is a Flavonoid (meaning that it gives a plant its color) that has antioxidant properties. It also acts as a foundation flavonoid for many other types of flavonoids in that plant family. Flavonoids do not only give plants their color, but also give it to fruits and vegetables and even flowers. They are responsible for all of the coloration of the plant that is not green (since the green in a plant is caused by an excess of chlorophyll. These flavonoids all have antioxidant properties which protect healthy cells from free radical damage. Quercetin may even add to the amount of Vitamin C in the body as well, thereby ensuring that one is protected from free radical molecules.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Citrulline DL-Malate 2:1 | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
L-Citrulline DL-Malate is a combination of the amino acid, Citrulline; and Malate, the salt of Malic Acid. These amino acids intend to provide a person with optimum health benefits, of which a combination of these two powerful substances provide. It is popularly used as a dietary supplement to boost athletic performance and extreme physical exertion by delaying the onset of fatigue and muscle pain.

It helps tired muscles recover fast from fatigue and physical exertion. High ammonia content in the blood causes muscles to tire easily and prevents the conversion of glucose into energy. Taking L-Citrulline DL-Malate removes the ammonia content from the blood giving the muscles longer-lasting performance and faster recovery time.

product.titre: L-Citrulline DL-Malate 2:1 | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
L-Citrulline DL-Malate is a combination of the amino acid, Citrulline; and Malate, the salt of Malic Acid. These amino acids intend to provide a person with optimum health benefits, of which a combination of these two powerful substances provide. It is popularly used as a dietary supplement to boost athletic performance and extreme physical exertion by delaying the onset of fatigue and muscle pain.

It helps tired muscles recover fast from fatigue and physical exertion. High ammonia content in the blood causes muscles to tire easily and prevents the conversion of glucose into energy. Taking L-Citrulline DL-Malate removes the ammonia content from the blood giving the muscles longer-lasting performance and faster recovery time.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Guar Gum | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Guar Gum is a derivative of the guar plant which can be found in areas such as Pakistan or India. It is routinely cultivated in the United States. It is used as a thickener and to stabilize a wide range of products and other supplements. India is possibly one of the biggest producers of Guar Gum and uses it in very many of their products. It is estimated that India’s usage of Guar Gum makes up about 80% of the global usage.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Rhodiola Rosea 3% Salidroside | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Rhodiola Rosea is a plant distinguished by its propensity towards growing in colder climates, such as the Rocky Mountains, and certain arctic regions. It is also particularly recognized for its ability to have a calming effect on a person or creature that is consuming it. It contains 17 different amino acids that are all necessary in promoting vital bodily functions. Not only that, but it also has a generous helping of flavonoids (important antioxidant molecules), phenylpropanoids, essential oils, and tannins.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Herbal Extracts
product.titre: Tribulus Terrestris Extract Powder | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Tribulus Terrestris can be found in many different countries in more tropical regions. Some of these areas include China, Europe, Mexico; with the most abundant amount of this plant being located in the Middle Eastern regions. It has been used in these regions as a form of medication for various ailments. There did not seem to be much of a consensus on what this plant was meant to cure originally and was prescribed to people suffering from depression, kidney, heart, and liver disease, and people who had biological problems retaining water in their bodies. This plant is also known as functioning as an aphrodisiac. It is an ingredient found in high abundance within energy powders used by bodybuilders and weight lifters due to its stamina increasing capabilities.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Calcium Lactate | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Calcium Lactate is a chemical compound produced when Calcium Carbonate combines with Lactic acid. It is used to prevent food poisoning by controlling the rapid growth of bacteria in processed foods, especially meat products.

It is commonly used as ingredient in the manufacture of sugar-free products, to delay the onset of tooth damage and decay. Calcium Lactate is believed that when this substance combines with Xylitol, as in making chewing gum, it improves tooth health by increasing the mineral content of tooth enamel.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Calcium Pyruvate | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Calcium Pyruvate is a combination between the mineral calcium and pyruvic acid. Pyruvate is manufactured naturally in the body; it is useful in its involvement in enhancing the metabolism and digestion of various carbohydrate types, as well as their subsequent conversion into usable energy. The Krebs Cycle, which is the name for the body’s various processes of deriving energy from chemical reactions, could not exist without the help of pyruvate. Pyruvate can also be found in a variety of other natural sources including red wine, dark beers, apples, and cheeses.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Dicalcium Phosphate (DCP) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Dicalcium Phosphate, or as it is sometimes called, Calcium Monohydrogen Phosphate, is a type of Dibasic Calcium Phosphate which is normally found in sources such as cereals, noodles, enriched flour, chicken feed, and some types of dog snacks. It is usually found in dehydrate form, but may be converted to the anhydrous form using thermal means. It has a variety of uses in many fields. Drug-makers use it to bind tablets and it can be found in modest quantities in bodily deodorants. It is even used to help control build-up of tartar in some brands of toothpaste.

product.titre: Magnesium Carbonate | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Magnesium Carbonate is an easily absorbed type of Magnesium salt which happens to be one of the most important minerals in the body, thus making Magnesium Carbonate a great way for the body to replenish low levels of Magnesium. Since Magnesium is needed for at least three hundred different bodily reactions to take place, it is quite necessary to maintain high levels of it.

It is an easily absorbed kind of Magnesium which happens to be one of the most important minerals in the body, thus making Magnesium Citrate a great way for the body to replenish low levels of Magnesium. Since Magnesium is needed for at least three hundred different bodily reactions to take place, it is quite necessary to maintain high levels of it.

product.titre: Magnesium Hydroxide | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Magnesium Hydroxide, or as it is sometimes referred to, Milk of Magnesia, is a compound whose main purpose is to keep up bowel regularity. It does this by increasing the amount of water available in the intestines. Because Magnesium is known to work so well with Calcium, it is recommended that it be taken along with a Calcium supplement at a 1:2 ratio.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Manganese Gluconate | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Manganese Gluconate is a salt combining Gluconic Acid and Manganese, which keeps up production of energy in the body and also keeps the Thyroid gland functioning correctly while stimulating development of the bones.

Manganese is one of those extremely important elements that the body simply can't do without. It is meant primarily to function as a Coenzyme to several different metabolic processes which together work to sustain life as we know it. More specifically, Manganese is involved deeply in the synthesis of proteins and in the metabolism of energy. It also forms connective tissue and strengthens bones while helping to maintain cholesterol levels and making sure insulin is still doing its job.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Scales & More
product.titre: Potassium Chloride | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Potassium Chloride is sometimes used as a substitute for salt. It also doubles as a way of replacing Potassium in those who have a Potassium deficiency.

Potassium is an essential mineral. It is important for the body to be supplied with constantly high levels of Potassium in order to help deal with the balance of water, the acidity levels of the body, the blood pressure, and the way the muscles respond to commands from the brain. It is also able to carry on impulses throughout the heart. In order for protein and carbohydrates to be properly metabolized, Potassium is necessary.

product.titre: Potassium L-Aspartate | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Potassium L-Aspartate is a combination of the chemical elements Potassium and Aspartic Acid intended to provide optimum health benefits. Potassium is highly abundant in nature and accounts for 2 percent of a person's body weight.

The mineral Potassium cannot be found in nature as it can be disastrous when it comes in contact with water, thus it usually combines with other elements as salt or ester, in this case with Aspartic Acid.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: Acetyl L-Carnitine (ALCAR) | Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: Acetyl-L-Carnitine Powder (sometimes shortened to ALCAR) is a type of L-Carnitine that has been acetylized. It is naturally produced by the human body in the kidneys and liver and is derived from the two essential amino acids, Methionine and Lysine. The body uses Acetyl-L-Carnitine to assist in oxidizing fatty acids. In simpler terms, this means that this ALCAR is used to help convert the fatty acids found in food into an exhaustible energy source, that in turn fuels the body. This works because ALCAR is the main vehicle that assists in the transference of these fatty acids to the mitochondrial membrane of each local cell where this oxidization routinely happens. ALCAR can be found in larger deposits near the areas of the body that most actively break down fatty acids on a regular basis, including those muscles that control the skeleton and the heart.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Arginine HCL | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description: L-Arginine is a substance produced by the body in limited quantities which is important in maintaining good oxygen flow throughout the body, in manufacturing Creatine (an exercise stimulant and energy creator), and in maintaining good functioning of the liver and kidneys. The HCL is added to maintain a neutral pH so that the resulting concoction creates less stomach issues than standard Arginine base, which has been linked to a few cases of stomach upset.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: L-Arginine Base | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
L-Arginine is a type of amino acid that does work to maintain the integrity of the skin, joints, liver, and muscles. It also helps in maintaining good levels of blood sugar, hormones, and keeps the immune system functioning well.

Arginine is one of the rare amino acids that is considered semi-essential, because although the body can manufacture perfectly appropriate amounts of the acid to keep up to normal amounts, every once in a while it may be necessary to supplement it. Arginine is able to support the immune system through its ability to produce T-cells and it is also supportive of the liver in that it is able to rid the body of toxins. Urea is needed in order for the body to expel Ammonia through the urine, however urea would not be manufactured without Arginine.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.titre: Creatine Ethyl Ester HCL (CEE) | Pure Powder or Capsules | PureDepot.com
product.description:
Creatine is a form of potential energy which is naturally produced by the body. Creatine Ethyl Ester HCL or CEE is just creatine bonded to an ester.

The liver is the chief organ responsible for the manufacture of creatine in the body through the process of methylation of guanidoacetate. Creatine can also be found in various foods with the largest stores being in red meats and fish. Once creatine has been absorbed into the body, broken down, and synthesized, it is moved all throughout the body rapidly to reach those areas that are in sore need for it, namely the heart, brain, and skeletal muscles. Creatine is then further metabolized inside these structures becoming phosphocreatine, a creatine relative that can be stored away and used later when strenuous physical activity takes place. This is the body’s primary source of energy storage.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Pure D-Ribose Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: D-Ribose is a carbohydrate and simple sugar which can be found naturally in the body of every living organism.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.description:
D-Ribose is a carbohydrate which can be found naturally in the body of every living organism including humans. It is necessary for the process of creating energy as it is one of the primary precursors to ATP (Adenosine Triphosphate) synthesis, and also helps to maintain normal levels of ATP in the body.

ATP is the driving force behind just about all cellular processes going on in the body. It is a molecule which is responsible for storing energy created by certain reactions and then later dispersing it during intense exercise and regular everyday activities. It can be found in the nucleoplasm and cytoplasm of the cell structure and is necessary in virtually every single cellular process that requires energy to operate. When food in each cell goes through the oxidization process, the energy that results from this action is taken and turned into ATP so that there is always a surplus contained in each cell to fuel it.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Featured, BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Muscle Growth, BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Protein Powder
product.titre: Pure CLEAN Whey Protein Powder Isolate 90% Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Whey is a substance produced during cheese production. It is the liquid content that remains after the milk has curdled and coagulated. It contains lactalbumin and 5% lactose that has been diluted in water. Whey can be processed and isolated into three different types of protein: Whey Protein Isolate, Whey Protein Concentrate and Whey Protein Hydrolysate. Whey Protein Isolate is the purest form, where the water, fats and lactose content have been removed. It contains a larger amount of pure protein than Whey Protein Concentrate and Whey Protein Hydrolysate.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Sports Supplements
product.description:
Whey is a substance produced during cheese production. It is the liquid content that remains when it separates from the milk after the milk has curdled and coagulated. It contains lactalbumin and 5 percent lactose that has been diluted in water.

Whey is processed and isolated into Whey Proteins which can be processed further into three types: Whey Protein Isolate, Whey Protein Concentrate and Whey Protein Hydrolysate. Cow's milk contains 20 percent Whey Protein and 80 percent Casein, while human milk contains 60 percent Whey and 40% Casein.

product.titre: Pure Mannitol Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Mannitol is a white, crystalline sugar alcohol that is used as sugar substitute. Mannitol is a polyol (sugar alcohol) widely used in the food and pharmaceutical industries due to its unique functional properties. It is about half as sweet as table sugar (sucrose) and has a desirable cooling effect often used to mask bitter taste, making it a popular low-calorie sweetener for cooking.

product.titre: Pure Sucralose Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Sucralose is derived from sugar. It has no calories (not metabolized), yet is believed to be 600 times sweeter than sugar. Food manufacturers and consumers use it in both cooking and baking.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Sports Supplements
product.description:
Citric Acid is a naturally occurring acid found primarily in several varieties of fruits and vegetables, with citrus fruits such as lemons and limes containing the highest amounts. This organic acid has many uses, including as a food additive/preservative, ingredient in cosmetic products, and as a powerful cleaning agent. Citric acid can be purchased as a white crystalline powder.

Citric Acid is notable for being a component of the Citric Acid cycle, a series of chemical reactions used by all aerobic organisms to generate energy through the oxidization of acetate derived from carbohydrates, fats and proteins into carbon dioxide.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Mental Wellness
product.description:
Phenibut is a kind of drug that possesses anxiolytic and nootropic properties. Its anxiolytic characteristics give this substance the ability to prevent anxiety and panic making a person relaxed and calm in stressful situations.

Phenibut is called a nootropic substance because of its ability to enhance intelligence, improve memory, concentration and focus by increasing the supply of oxygen to the brain, by promoting the growth of new nerve tissues, and by regulating the availability of hormones, enzymes and neurotransmitters.

Sucralose is derived from sugar. It has no calories (not metabolized), yet 600 times sweeter than sugar. Sucralose tastes like sugar. It has a clean, quickly perceptible, sweet taste that does not leave an unpleasant aftertaste. Food manufacturers and consumers can use it virtually anywhere sugar is used, including cooking and baking. Sucralose has many benefits: tastes like sugar, help control caloric intake, advantageous for people with Diabetes, does not promote tooth decay, extraordinary heat stability, long shelf life and ingredient compatibility. Sucralose was approved by FDA as a safe sweetener, FDA Acceptable Daily Intake (ADI) is 5mg/Kg body weight . Sucralose is the sweet ingredient of brand name SPLENDA®.

product.description: Stevia is a type of plant that has very sweet leaves. The extract powder is zero calorie, heat stable, pH stable, and non-fermentable. It has received attention due to the rising demand for low-carbohydrate, low-sugar food alternatives.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Sweeteners
product.titre: Pure Xylitol Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Xylitol is a sugar alcohol that is used as an artificial sweetener. It is also notably used to maintain teeth and gum health.

Xylitol is a sugar alcohol that is used as artificial sweetener. It is the kind of sweetener that is kind to your teeth and has other tremendous health benefits to the body. Xylitol chewing gum is used to prevent tooth decay by inhibiting the growth of Streptococci, which is the main cause of damage to tooth enamel. It significantly reduces the production of acid that causes the growth of plaque on the gums surrounding the teeth. It also plays an important role in the re-mineralization of your teeth.

Xylitol protects against Otitis Media by preventing the growth of the Streptococci Pneumoniae bacteria. It also prevents the Pneumococci and flu bacteria from adhering to the cell walls of the nose and pharynx. A clinical trial conducted to prove the efficacy of Xylitol in treating Otitis Media showed there was no need to give antibiotics to those who were treated with Xylitol.

product.titre: Pure D-Mannose Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: D-Mannose is a glycol-nutrient sugar that can be found naturally in fruits and the human body. It is believed to promote overall bladder health.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Amino Acids
product.description: D-Mannose is a Glycol-nutrient sugar that can be found naturally in fruits. The human body also produces it. This sugar is unlike Glucose, which normally is absorbed quite quickly in the body. This sugar is absorbed into the body slowly. It does not transform into glycogen, or get stored in the liver. It travels from the upper section of the gastrointestinal tract to other parts of the body, through the bloodstream. It is essentially filtered through the kidneys and then effectively delivered to the bladder.

product.categorie: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
product.titre: Pure D-Glucosamine Sulfate Potassium Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description:
Glucosamine is a substance that you produce naturally from a Glucose and an amino acid. As we age, the amount our body can produce reduces. It is used by the body to produce chemicals involved in building cartilage, tendons, ligaments and joint fluid. Research shows supplementing a healthy diet with Glucosamine may help ease achy joints and stiffness.

D-Glucosamine Sulfate Potassium supplies both glucosamine and sulphur, which is also important for healthy joints. There are people that need the additional sulphate so prefer Potassium Chloride to HCl.

product.titre: Pure Sucralose Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Sucralose is derived from sugar. It has no calories (not metabolized), yet 600 times sweeter than sugar. Sucralose tastes like sugar. It has a clean, quickly perceptible, sweet taste that does not leave an unpleasant aftertaste. Food manufacturers and consumers can use it virtually anywhere sugar is used, including cooking and baking. Sucralose has many benefits: tastes like sugar, help control caloric intake, advantageous for people with Diabetes, does not promote tooth decay, extraordinary heat stability, long shelf life and ingredient compatibility. Sucralose was approved by FDA as a safe sweetener, FDA Acceptable Daily Intake (ADI) is 5mg/Kg body weight . Sucralose is the sweet ingredient of brand name SPLENDA®.

The Stevia Extract powder is zero calorie, heat stable, pH stable, and non-fermentable. Stevia, especially Stevia Extract powder, has garnered attention with the rise in demand for low-carbohydrate, low-sugar food alternatives. Stevia Extract powder may benefit for weight loss and human being with diabetes. Stevia is a type of plant that has very sweet leaves. These leaves have been used to sweeten drinks and as a sugar substitute in Central and South America. For centuries, tribes in Paraguay, Brazil and Bolivia have used Stevia leaves to sweeten teas and traditional medicines. Stevia extract can be 300 times sweeter than sugar.

product.titre: Pure CLEAN Whey Protein Powder Concentrate 80% Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Whey is a substance produced during cheese production. It is the liquid content that remains after the milk has curdled and coagulated. Whey can be processed and isolated into three different types of protein: Whey Protein Isolate, Whey Protein Concentrate and Whey Protein Hydrolysate.

product.titre: Pure CLEAN Whey Protein Powder Isolate 90% Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description:
Made in the USA, our Whey Protein Concentrate is made using a cold, micro-filtered process.

The powder contains 80% Whey Protein, Branch Chain Amino Acids and other amino acids. This powder tastes great, but it is unsweetened. Add your own sweetener if desired.

product.titre: Pure CLEAN Whey Protein Powder Isolate 90% Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description:
Whey is a substance produced during cheese production. It is the liquid content that remains when it separates from the milk after the milk has curdled and coagulated. It contains lactalbumin and 5 percent lactose that has been diluted in water.

Whey is processed and isolated into Whey Proteins which can be processed further into three types: Whey Protein Isolate, Whey Protein Concentrate and Whey Protein Hydrolysate. Cow's milk contains 20 percent Whey Protein and 80 percent Casein, while human milk contains 60 percent Whey and 40% Casein.

product.description:

product.titre: Pure Xylitol Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description:
Xylitol is a sugar alcohol that is used as artificial sweetener. It is the kind of sweetener that is kind to your teeth and has other tremendous health benefits to the body. Xylitol chewing gum is used to prevent tooth decay by inhibiting the growth of Streptococci, which is the main cause of damage to tooth enamel. It significantly reduces the production of acid that causes the growth of plaque on the gums surrounding the teeth. It also plays an important role in the re-mineralization of your teeth.

Xylitol protects against Otitis Media by preventing the growth of the Streptococci Pneumoniae bacteria. It also prevents the Pneumococci and flu bacteria from adhering to the cell walls of the nose and pharynx. A clinical trial conducted to prove the efficacy of Xylitol in treating Otitis Media showed there was no need to give antibiotics to those who were treated with Xylitol.

product.titre: Pure Phenibut Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description:
Phenibut is a kind of drug that possesses anxiolytic and nootropic properties. Its anxiolytic characteristics give this substance the ability to prevent anxiety and panic making a person relaxed and calm in stressful situations.

Phenibut is called a nootropic substance because of its ability to enhance intelligence, improve memory, concentration and focus by increasing the supply of oxygen to the brain, by promoting the growth of new nerve tissues, and by regulating the availability of hormones, enzymes and neurotransmitters.

The Inuits were the subject of many studies by researchers trying to determine the benefits of fatty acids. This is because even though their diet is typically very high in fat, they do not usually have any cardiac issues that are often associated with those that eat foods high in fat. The reason why this is the case has been linked to Docosahexaenoic Acid (DHA) as well as Eicosapentaenoic Acid (EPA).

product.titre: Pure Calcium Carbonate (USA) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description:
Calcium is essential to have circulating throughout the body periodically in order to maintain healthy bones and strong teeth, facilitate fast and efficient blood clotting, and to transmit nerve impulses correctly.

The best way to maintain healthy levels of Calcium is to have a Calcium balanced diet. Suggested serving size for calcium is about 1000mg daily as recommended by the FDA, and since a single serving of any type of dairy generally contains about 300mg of Calcium, someone who has about four servings of dairy on a daily basis need not supplement their diet with any more.
Conjugated Linoleic Acid Softgel (1000mg) CLA is a fatty acid that occurs naturally in meat as well as in some dairy sources.

product.description:
This is the perfect scale for weighing individual portion sizes of our powdered products.

Pocket scale with a 100g limit. It weighs in increments of 0.01.

Extremely portable, this fully functional pocket scale will serve all your measuring needs! Featuring a bright LCD screen with a blue backlight, the scale has a capacity of up to 100g, with three different weighing modes (oz, dwt and ozt). It also has a full capacity Tare function. The scale features a durable weighing surface measuring 2.0 by 2.0 inches and includes a detachable face plate to serve as a measuring plate. .

product.titre: Pure Citric Acid Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description:
Citric Acid is a naturally occurring acid found primarily in several varieties of fruits and vegetables, with citrus fruits such as lemons and limes containing the highest amounts. This organic acid has many uses, including as a food additive/preservative, ingredient in cosmetic products, and as a powerful cleaning agent. Citric acid can be purchased as a white crystalline powder.

Citric Acid is notable for being a component of the Citric Acid cycle, a series of chemical reactions used by all aerobic organisms to generate energy through the oxidization of acetate derived from carbohydrates, fats and proteins into carbon dioxide.

product.description: D-Aspartic Acid is a nonessential amino acid that is slightly less bioavailable than L-Aspartic acid; however, it is much more pronounced in its effects.

product.titre: Pure D-Aspartic Acid Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description:
D-Aspartic Acid is an non-essential amino acid which is necessary for the development of the nervous system and the correct functioning of the neuroendocrine system.

D-Aspartic Acid is just a bit less bioavailable than L-Aspartic acid, but it has a much more pronounced effect on increasing the release and the synthesis of testosterone. This is what makes it so accessible and popular in the fields of bodybuilding and athleticism.

product.titre: Pure Creatine Monohydrate (Micronized) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Creatine Monohydrate powder is taken from the compound Creatine, which is essential in the process of sending energy directly to muscle. It is naturally produced by the body.

product.titre: Pure Creatine Monohydrate (Micronized) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Creatine Monohydrate powder is taken from the compound Creatine, which is essential in the process of sending energy directly to muscle. Supplements of Creatine Monohydrate are constantly being studied by nutritionists for their energy creation properties. It is naturally produced by the body in organs such as the liver, pancreas, and kidneys and can be found in areas as diverse as the brain, heart, and all muscle tissue; where it is stored to later provide energy and strength during strenuous exercise. This is what makes this supplement such a popular choice among athletes and bodybuilders. It can be derived from Glycine, Methionine, and Arginine, three very important amino acids, and also from red meats and fish which typically contain about 2-2.5 grams per pound.

product.titre: Pure Acetyl L-Carnitine (ALCAR) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Acetyl-L-Carnitine Powder (sometimes shortened to ALCAR) is a type of L-Carnitine that has been acetylized. It is naturally produced in the body and is derived from the two essential amino acids, Methionine and Lysine.

product.titre: Pure Acetyl L-Carnitine (ALCAR) Powder in Bulk | BulkSupplements.com
product.description: Acetyl-L-Carnitine Powder (sometimes shortened to ALCAR) is a type of L-Carnitine that has been acetylized. It is naturally produced by the human body in the kidneys and liver and is derived from the two essential amino acids, Methionine and Lysine. The body uses Acetyl-L-Carnitine to assist in oxidizing fatty acids. In simpler terms, this means that this ALCAR is used to help convert the fatty acids found in food into an exhaustible energy source, that in turn fuels the body. This works because ALCAR is the main vehicle that assists in the transference of these fatty acids to the mitochondrial membrane of each local cell where this oxidization routinely happens. ALCAR can be found in larger deposits near the areas of the body that most actively break down fatty acids on a regular basis, including those muscles that control the skeleton and the heart.
